A short well-written mystery visual novel. In a futuristic world, Emily, a young ex-college student gets into a self-driving taxi to get to her new job interview,  unfortunately, the car hits who was riding a bike. Emily and three other passengers tried to find a clue how did this happen, to her surprise, the man who died was her late boss who fired her. Can she convince the others that she isn't the one who caused the accident?https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2826976232The gameplay was really nice, I liked the questioning and collecting of evidence, the only thing the game lacks is voice-overs, it'd have been more fun. The soundtracks are nice as well as the artwork.https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2826977069The characters are interesting, the more you question them, the more you learn about their real personality, I honestly didn't know who did it until the end of the game, I kept on jumping with accusations.  https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2826976355Pros:+Interesting story.+Interesting Characters.+Good soundtracks.+Manual save.Cons:-Short game.-No Steam achievements. I recommend this game to VN lovers and people who enjoy short mystery games. 𝐹𝑜𝑟 𝑚𝑜𝑟𝑒 𝑟𝑒𝑣𝑖𝑒𝑤𝑠 𝑐𝘩𝑒𝑐𝑘 𝑚𝑦 𝑐𝑢𝑟𝑎𝑡𝑜𝑟 𝑝𝑎𝑔𝑒 𝐹𝑒𝑒𝑛𝑎'𝑠 𝐶𝘩𝑜𝑖𝑐𝑒

What a creative game, I absolutely feel bad for not playing it earlier. You play as a 'cleaner' your main mission is to get rid of bodies and any evidence that leads to the death of the target. There are many methods of doing it, but there is definitely a perfect way of executing it. https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2831368006The length of the game is great, you get to play ten main missions plus two extra ones, if you ever fail to hide specific evidence you can always go back and finish where you've left it. There is also a pager that is used as a hint to guide you through your mission, just be careful not to get caught and make sure you return everything to its original place. https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2831368770The artwork and soundtracks of the game are very nice, I loved most of the areas and the details in them, sometimes you'll have to pixel hunt to find a specific object but you can always press 'S' to highlight all h spots in case you needed help. https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2831042205Pros:+Interesting stories and methods of getting rid of the bodies.+Unique gameplay.+Good soundtracks.+Good puzzles.+Good game length.+Hinting system+Chapters select.+Steam achievements.Cons:-Nothing.I'd love to play more unique games like this one, there is a second chapter released only for phones, looking forward to see them on steam soon. Highly recommended to people who enjoy mystery, puzzles, and challenges. 𝐹𝑜𝑟 𝑚𝑜𝑟𝑒 𝑟𝑒𝑣𝑖𝑒𝑤𝑠 𝑐𝘩𝑒𝑐𝑘 𝑚𝑦 𝑐𝑢𝑟𝑎𝑡𝑜𝑟 𝑝𝑎𝑔𝑒 𝐹𝑒𝑒𝑛𝑎'𝑠 𝐶𝘩𝑜𝑖𝑐𝑒

Outstanding prologue! I honestly enjoyed everything and looking forward to playing the full game. The story starts with Harvey, an author who is trying to write and sell his book. One night, he left his hotel room for a stroll in Villa Ventana town, only to discover an abandoned house with a radio mentioning his name. https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2830910179The artwork and voice acting were top-notch, I liked the game's mechanics and glad to see a fast-traveling map as it is clearly will be a big game. I was skeptical at the beginning since I have never played a 3D VN, but I was wrong, I enjoyed this game thoroughly. The story is about five people waking up in a dark basement, having no memory of what brought them to this place. None of them knows the other but turned out an event in the past linked them all to a tragedy.  https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2827896171You play as Leon, a young security guard who has no clue why he was brought to this dark and old place, solving riddles and trying to cope with the other people. The choices have a huge impact on the game and the characters reactions around you. I actually kept on suspecting one after another, each one is hiding something but you need to squeeze information from them. https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2827895685Some of the characters are likable, I didn't like the 3D models at the beginning but I somehow liked them, I think the game would have been even better with voiceovers. https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2827897702Pros:+Interesting story.+Interesting characters.+Choices and consequences.+Good soundtracks.+Multiple endings and routes.+Manual save.+Steam achievements.Cons:-Quite short, wish for more content. Clearly, the game has multiple endings, I got the good ending myself, being the good and helpful guy, but would you trust the people around you or not, it's all up to you. Looking forward to a sequel. Recommended to people who enjoy mystery and investigation VN.𝐹𝑜𝑟 𝑚𝑜𝑟𝑒 𝑟𝑒𝑣𝑖𝑒𝑤𝑠 𝑐𝘩𝑒𝑐𝑘 𝑚𝑦 𝑐𝑢𝑟𝑎𝑡𝑜𝑟 𝑝𝑎𝑔𝑒 𝐹𝑒𝑒𝑛𝑎'𝑠 𝐶𝘩𝑜𝑖𝑐𝑒

Another FMV filmed during the lockdown. This murder mystery story starts off with Abby, a young woman whose mother mostly controls her life. She got a video call from her uncle entrusting her with a huge task by telling her he was poisoned by one of the family members during a meeting they had not long ago. Abby's mission is to question everyone during the group video call that they initiating to celebrate her mother's birthday. Time is limited and she needs to find out who did it as soon as she can or, uncle Marcus will die.https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2822273293I thoroughly enjoyed the game, I liked the main character Abby, she is very cute, and her aunt June was an amazing actress, she was savage. The others were good as well, all of them are likable even their mother and her silly singing. The gameplay is quite nice, you get to question the family members in each round, and each one has a different outcome and evidence.https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2822275328It has a high reply value as collecting the evidence adds up each time you play and question the people, you can't accuse anyone unless their evidence meter adds up and is enough to accuse them.https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2822293516Pros:+FMV game.+Choices and consequences.+Invistigation.+Good acting.+Choices are timed by default but there is an option to pause them.+Characters evidence meter.+Multiple endings.+High replay value.+Steam achievements.Cons-No manual save.I liked the concept of the game, I'd love to find more investigation FMVs. Recommended to FMV lovers and people who enjoy mystery games. Five dates is FMV launched during the lockdown and COVID time - No one wants to remember those days. The story is about digital dating since no one can leave home. The main character, Vinny signed up on this digital dating system. You'll have to choose three dates out of five, and each day you'll reduce them until you end up with one date, the last date with the 'right one' https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2804248045In the beginning, you'll have to choose your hobbies and zodiac sign, along with other traits. Whatever you'll choose will change the conversation between you and your date, for example, if you pick Fitness, you'll show that you are an athlete and so on.  https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2804246823After you beat the game once, you'll be able to skip the previously seen conversation by pressing 'Tab' but I've noticed that it also chooses the first option as a response which ruined my second playthrough, I didn't like that. https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2804247433Pros:+FMV game.+Dating story.+Choices and consequences.+Choices are timed by default but there is an option to pause them.+Characters relationships meter (Depends on your choices)+Multiple endings.+Steam achievements.Cons:-In the second playthrough you can skip the previously seen scenes by pressing 'TAB' but it will automatically pick the first choice in any choices.-No manual save.-ShortThe concept is nice, and the acting is good, but I found myself bored midway and could never see myself going through those dates again.Other reviews:The Bunker ReviewLate Shift ReviewThe Shapeshifting DetectiveDark Nights with Poe and MunroThe Complex ReviewI Saw Black Clouds Review𝐹𝑜𝑟 𝑚𝑜𝑟𝑒 𝑟𝑒𝑣𝑖𝑒𝑤𝑠 𝑐𝘩𝑒𝑐𝑘 𝑚𝑦 𝑐𝑢𝑟𝑎𝑡𝑜𝑟 𝑝𝑎𝑔𝑒 𝐹𝑒𝑒𝑛𝑎'𝑠 𝐶𝘩𝑜𝑖𝑐𝑒

Little Misfortune is a very cute-looking game, but don't judge the book from its cover, this game is very creepy and has dark humor. You play as Misfortune, a young girl with a cute accent, she lives with a dysfunctional family but she loves her mother dearly. One day, while she is playing with her dolls, she started to speak with a voice in her head, she named him Mr. voice. He decided to play a little game with her and for start.. she has to leave the house into the woods..https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2609979211I enjoyed the game fully, the voice acting is outstanding, both the main character and narrator did an amazing job. The artwork is very cute and colorful, I like the character's design as well. The soundtracks weren't bad too.https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2609979292The gameplay is simple, you move Misfortune from left to right to reach her destination, there are a few and simple puzzles to solve, but most of the games are based on your choices, how she responds, and how she treats people and things around her. She has a cute journal but unfortunately, you can't view it except for the beginning of the game. She also picks items to use occasionally. https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2609975338Pros:+Interesting well-written story.+Beautiful artwork and locations.+Cute characters.+Good soundtracks.+Two endings and multiple outcomes to the characters.+Amazing voiceovers.+Choices and consequences.+Manual save.+Steam achievements.Cons:-Short.-Simple puzzles. I played the game twice to get a good ending, I still couldn't as you need to collect 'happiness' I'd play the game again as it is very enjoyable. The choices you made don't impact the ending, it only impacts the characters around you and what will happen to them. I do recommend it to point&click lovers. Bom, sei que demorou um pouco para fazer esta análise mas eu precisava ter experiência suficiente neste jogo, digo obra prima, se quiser o resumo dela é simplesmente "compre o mais rápido possivel"Mas se quiser mais detalhes sobre Dark souls e suas mecânicas "malucas" e tão inovadoras vamos continuar.Sim esse jogo é difícil, (o mais difícil da trilogia na minha opinião) mas a dificuldade diminui muito quando você  aprende realmente como o jogo funciona, suas mecânicas de escala das armas com destreza e força, inteligencia e fé, acredite isso é muito importante, saiba escolher a arma correta para sua build, e escolha bem seus atributos, porque diferente de Dark Souls 2 e 3 aqui você nao pode montar seu personagem novamente.Muitas coisas fizeram esse jogo ser o meu predileto entre todos, onde eu investi mais de 1k de horas ( sim eu tenho 1,3k de horas no Dark Souls 2, mas isso fica para uma próxima análise, SE ACONTECER) as mecânicas do Dark Souls são incríveis cada arma com seu move set único, combinando com sua forma de jogar; seja vc focado em pura força com clavas imensas tirando danos massivos com apenas 2 hits, ou você focado em armas rápidas, e move sets rápidos, as katanas serão uma das suas prediletas ( são as minhas) ou com ataques a longa distancias, sendo eles magias ou flechas.Lembro a primeira vez que visitei Blighttown, eu definitivamente não devia estar lá, e percebi quando quase morri para umas imitações de aranhas mutantes, ou quando encontrei as caveiras perto em baixo de firelink ( caminho das catacumbas) a experiência foi incrível, pois hoje as pessoas estão acostumadas com jogos que as pegam pela mao e empurram elas para onde ir, colocam uma seta gigante na sua cara, e você agradece por estar sendo ajudado, e nao ter  nenhuma dificuldade em jogar determinado jogo ( eu nao julgo, ate entendo, mas nao curto) Dark Souls para de ser difícil depois que você aprende a rolar e desviar efetivamente dos inimigos, chegando ao ponto de nem mesmo ser acertado.Devo mencionar as covenants do jogo, cada uma tendo seu foco principal, na sua maioria envolvendo o online do jogo, não vou me aprofundar muito nesses assuntos pois existe a wiki do jogo, e lá tem todas as informações possíveis, utilize ela para todas suas dívidas.As magias são overpower, magias negras são overkill, matam tudo e todos em alguns segundos ( mas você precisa de um personagem focado em inteligencia para ter um dano efetivo,com a adição de alguns itens)Á interação online é muito bacana, seja pelas mensagens no chao, pelo coop ou Pvp, eu só consegui utilizar do online de forma efetiva após conhecer o aplicativo DSCM ( Dark Souls Connectivity Mod) procure no Google inicie ele antes de abrir o jogo e sua vida será 1000% mais fácil, no passado havia muita dificuldade em se conectar no servidor, e era quase impossível jogar com os amigos, com esse mod você pode facilitar a conexão com seus Brothers pela steam id deles.Não sei se está lendo até aqui, se sim você é fod@, seria impossível não recomendar esse jogo que me fez se apaixonar pelo estilo de jogos hardcore, e me ensinou que quando ngm pega na sua mão, ngm fica te ensinando, ngm te ajuda efetivamente e voce aprende por você mesmo, você vence por você mesmo, você se diverte pelas coisas que você aprendeu sozinho, isso sim é se divertir, sim você vai morrer várias vezes podendo até mesmo quebrar seu controle ( como eu fiz em Anor Londo, na parte dos arqueiros) mas quando você matar cada boss, a sensação de satisfação por um desafio concluído é inexplicável.Os gráficos sao meio feinhos, mas existem mods para isso, e para colocar o jogo em 60fps, baixem tbm o mod Watchdog ( nao não é da Ubisoft, me poupe da piadinha) esse mod vai te prevenir dos espertoes de plantão que ficam hackeando o jogo, sua maioria asiático e americanos de vez em quando eu encontrava um BR.Enfim é isso, em resumo é COMPREM ESSE JOGO, POIS ELE É MARAVILHOSO.

Como recomendar esse jogo sem citar a palavra "perfeito" ?Esse jogo vai entrar na historia da minha vida, simplismente ele mexe com vc, e o seu emocional de uma forma incrivel, parece um filme vivo, as pessoas em sua volta, cada uma carrega uma historia e fica a seu criterio descobrir seus problemas e tentar ajuda-los, vc entra na pele da Max Caulfield uma jovem de 18 anos que um momento totalmente inusitado de sua vida descobre que consegue voltar alguns segundos no tempo, e com essa nova habilidade ela percebe que pode ajudar as pessoas a sua volta, mas como todos sabem, mudar a ordem dos acontecimentos pode e vai trazer graves consequencias, ou seja o jogo é bem parecido com o ja consagrado (The Walking Dead ) pelo fato das escolhas terem todo o peso possivelEsse jogo é claramente baseado no filme Efeito Borboleta ( um dos meus filmes prediletos ) . A sensaçao de estar jogando uma obra prima é instantanea desde do primeiro segundo do jogo, e nao posso esquecer da trilha sonora incrivel que o jogo carrega, cada musica colocada no momento certo para combinar com cada momento do jogo, eu digo que após jogar esse jogo vc vai pensar mais sobre as coisas que poderia ter feito se tivesse aproveitado melhor o seu tempo. Entao coloque os  fones e aproveite um dos melhores jogos da atualidadeBom se com essa minha analise eu conseguir fazer uma unica pessoa comprar esse jogo ja ficarei feliz, pq sei que essa pessoa vai estar fazendo uma compra excelente.Grafico           9/10Audio             10/10Jogabilidade  8,5/10Diversao        10/10

Evolve é um classico multiplayer para se jogar com os amigos, sim vc pode jogar sozinho offline, mas realmente nao recomendo pois fica muito chato devido a inteligencia artificial extremamente idiota e inutil, muitas vezes vc vai cair e os bots nao irao te levantar,o jogo é relativamente dificil principalmente se vc entrar na pele do monstro (uma das experiencias mais legais que o jogo traz) o que torna a jogatina dificil com o monstro é a jogabilidade, pois muitas vezes vc confunde os botoes, mas nd que vc nao possa se acostumar com o tempo .. infelizmente nem tudo sao flores, o jogo é muito pesado entao se vc nao tem um pc meio "forte" nao adianta comprar pois o jogo vai engasgar, eu particularmente gostei muito dele principalmente em entrar na pele do monstro, mas como ja falei o jogo foi feito pra jogar com amigos, se vc comprar pra jogar online com jogadores aleatorios existe grande chances de vc nao gostar do jogo, afinal todos sabem, trabalho em equipe esta em falta nessa geraçao, outro ponto a se mencionar sao as dlc, realmente nao vale a pena comprar nunhuma, compre apenas o jogo pra nao gastar dinheiro atoa Graficos  9/10  Som  8,5/10 Jogabilidade  8/10 Diversao   9,5/10

Du bist eine Mischung aus Shroud und einem RTL Messie?Ja dann rein in die Olga.The Cycle ist ein PvE/PvP Loot Shooter der beste Vergleich wäre Tarkov oder Hunt.Ihr spielt auf 2 Karten Sammelt Items, tötet Monster, erfüllt Aufgaben und kämpft gegen andere Spieler um ihren und euren Loot.Sterbt ihr ist alles weg. Tötet ihr jemanden gehört euch alles was er dabei hat.Das Spiel bietet ein sehr intensives Erlebnis wenn es gut läuft fühlt ihr ein maximales Hoch, wenn es dann aber schlecht läuft kann es extrem frustrierend sein.Ich kann dieses Spiel jedem empfehlen der bereits diese Spiele cool findet: Rust, Escape From Tarkov, DayZ, Hunt: Showdown, Apex LegendsSolo ist stressig, geht aber zu zweit macht es am meisten Spaß meiner Meinung nach7,5/10
Sus wenn es dir nicht gefällt.

Bock auf ein spontanes Abenteuer? Ja? Perfekt.Wer Pirates of the Caribean im Fernseher schon geil fand wird in dem Game definitiv auf seine Kosten kommen.Ihr segelt alle und bis zu 4 Spieler auf einem Schiff und könnt euch zwischen PvE Events, Geschichten (Quests), PvP zwischen sehr vielen unterschiedlichen Beschäftigungen entscheiden.Die See schlachten machen Spaß vor allem gegen andere Crews und hier ist auch der Knackpunkt.Wenn du alleine spielst ist das spiel deutlich schwieriger somit auch frustrierender wenn man dadurch verliert, alleine ist dieses Spiel wirklich stressig aber sobald man es 2-3/4 spielt extremer Spaß garantiert.Dicke Kauf Empfehlung für Freunde die was zusammen zocken wollen

Warscheinlich der größte Fail in der Gaming- Geschichte.Aber zum Spiel erstmal.Levelkonzept ist anders aber auf eine Gute art und Weise. Egal was ihr in diesem Spiel tut es levelt euch auch Farmen und PvP werden hier berücksichtigt. Dungeons und Bosse werden mit höherem Level interessanter und PvP in der Openworld, Kriege und Invasionen machen extrem viel Spaß.Für jemanden der alles Frisch am erleben ist ein absoluter Spaß mit viel Motivation.Jetzt das Hauptproblem:Je länger man spielt desto mehr sieht man wie verkommen das Spiel in seiner Idee ist.Auf max lv 60 sind die Routine aufgaben unfassbar langweilig. Man läuft immer wieder den selben Content ab der nicht wirklich neues bringt.Das Wirtschaftssystem ist absolut im Arsch da Exploits hier alles verzehrt haben.Das Fraktionssystem ist: 60% der Serverspieler sind Lila die anderen 35% Grün und dann hast du noch die restlichen 5% die Gelb gewählt haben weil sie vor der Entscheidung besoffen waren.Das führt dazu die Wirtschaftlich besten bereiche immer von den selben Fraktion gehalten werden da sie die größere Spielerkapazität aufbringen.Das Spiel hat kein gutes Endgame und das hat dazu geführt das viele Spieler einschließlich ich das Interesse an dem Spiel verloren habe.Amazon hatte den besten Start um ein Erfolgreiches MMORPG auf die Beine zustellen und hat ab dem Launch alles verhauen was geht.

Im quite sure I'll get bored after time, but it'll be long time ahead.Also, I think that the "DLC"'s are overpriced. 40 euros for 14 weapons, 3 characters ( +1 in earlyaccess ), 28 day booster, some character and gear points and an overly high amount of cash?I'll pass on that one, since I got the game for ~4 euros of steam stuff. And would I like to spendten times the amount on a "DLC" which gives me shiny guns? No. Still, I recommend the gameif you're tired of Dota 2 & LoL, and want to add some Zombies, and have a blast.Total: 3/5. P2W.

У тебя нет ощущения дежавю ? Слышал много новостей по этой игре , в частности по поводу того что она утерет нос Overwatch"у .Тогда я просто смеялся над этим , не веря тому что все вокруг возлагают надежды на нее. И вот однажды зайдя в Steam , я увидел что мой друг уже по тихоньку гонял в нее . Ну вот и я заинтересовался .........Originally posted by Гэндзи: Только здесь я не чувствую себя изгоем...	Быстро установив игру , у меня возникли небольшие проблемы . В частности этот идиотский лаунчер ...... Он просто взбесил меня ...... Но сквозь подрыв пукана и матерные слова я все такие запустил игру . В меню авторизациии я услышал знакомую мелодию , в частности напоминающую мэйн из Overwatch . Зайдя в настройки у меня случился небольшой подрыв пукана . Это меню настроек ........ Да оно же в частности скопировано из Overwatch . Я был возмущен , но превозмог все боли и все таки начал играть......Originally posted by D.VA: А я-то думала, ты скиловый игрок	Игра не заставила меня ждать , все произошло быстро..... По иронии судьбы , первым был ознокамительный матч , оно же обучение . И тут произошел БУМ ....... Мы играем за некое подобие Солдата-76 , а в помошниках у нас персонаж похожий на Трейсер . Все происходит в точности как обучение в Overwatch . Меня это немножечко всбесило ибо я терпеть не могу копирайт других игр . Но вот пришло время моего первого матча........Originally posted by Маккри , Жнецу: Тебе оружие выдали, чтобы ты им разбрасывался ?	И ТУТ СВЕРШИЛОСЬ НЕЧТОЕ ..... БУДТО Я ПОПАЛ СНОВА В ЭТОТ ЧУДЕСНЫЙ МИР ОВЕРВОТЧА ( только не платя 2,5К за игру ) . Все эти персонажи , анимации , фразы , и в конце концов вся эта СУЕТА нахлынулась на меня . Я был наверное на седьмом небе от счастья . Бой шёл ровно , мы побеждали . Мне пришлось выбрать персонажа , некое подобие Ханзо , только в образе рыжеволосой девушки . Бой длился около 5-7 минут . Все это время я получал неимоверное кол-во радости и счастья . И вот мы победили . По иронии судьбы я попал в топ игроков и мой момент серии убийств был показан в качестве повтора . Те кто играл в Overwatch знают этот незабываемый прилив ........ Будто размер письки и ЧСВ долетели до небес ..... Попробуй-ка занерфить На последок скажу : - Есть игры , где ты просто играешь , а есть те где ты отдыхаешь душой . Именно эта игра является тем самым глотком свежего воздуха , который помогает стать бодрее . Студии Hi-Rez удалось сделать лучшую копию неповторимого оригинала . Браво Советую поиграть в эту игру каждому

Devs interessiert das spiel nicht, patches werden nichtmal von denen getestet. Brauchst kein skill und musst nur knöpfe spammen. Charaktere sind unbalanced, entweder absolut scheiße oder busted. Beim matchmaking werden egal auf welchem skill level einfach leute zusammen geschmissen, crossplay ist wahrscheinlich drin weil das game sonst ganz tot wär. Fair play kann man in dem spiel so oder so nicht erwarten ganks werden angefangen wie normal und sobald du kurz vor Rache bist spielen sie wie die letzten ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥, etwas das nach eins zwei malen sehr langweilig wird. Es ist weder wie versprochen Fair, safe oder Fun. 99% der reworks töten das spiel immer mehr bist es nach nem monat einen "hotfix" der wenn er gut sein sollte zu spät ist. Das HUD ist broken. Die server ♥♥♥♥, community meh. META sind Bashes, unblockables und guess what noch mehr bashes.Fazit: Wenn du deine nerven behalten willst kauf es dir nicht, es gibt Lustige momente wo es läuft aber die sind eher rar.

Vorab: Es ist für anfänger nicht zu empfehlen. Rainbow six siege ist ein Super 5v5 Casual Multiplayer/competetive Shooter der auf Taktik, Logischem denken, Teamwork und so weiter BASIERT heißt nicht das sich alle daran "halten" sondern eher in den Höheren Leveln (Sofern kein smurf) zutrifft durch die Längere erfahrung in dem spiel. Es ist wie boxen: du kannst es durch trainieren richtig gut und sobald du anfängst nicht mehr zu trainieren (in dem Fall zu spielen) schlechter wirst und "von vorne" anfangen musst. Overall gut zu empfehlen. Die Community ist Je nach Region anders.

Es ist rundum Sehr gut, das problem ist nach der zeit wird es etwas langweilig und Einseitig wird. Ich, nach etwa 940 std in dem spiel kann sagen es ist zu empfehlen auch um neue Freunde zu finden.

The Forest,bin was Survivial Spiele angeht sehr skeptisch, da es auf dem Markt ja viele Ableger gibt, die entweder Pay2Win sind, oder nur verbuggt sind.Das war auch einer der Gründe warum ich mir so viel Zeit gelassen habe um mir TheForest zu holen.Doch das Spiel hat mich von der 1Minute gefesselt, es ist leicht verständlich, man kommt somit gut rein, lernt sehr schnell und kann auch herum probieren.Hat einen gewissen schwierigkeits Grad der das Spiel noch besser macht.Das Spiel bietet sogar Kostenlos an eigene Server zu öffnen um mit Freunden zu spielen.Actioan 10/10 , es ist immer was losHorror 10/10 , die Geräusche sind der Hammer, bekomme immer eine Gänsehaut wenn sich Kanibalen nähern Story 10/10 der verlorene Sohn , auf einer Insel voller Kanibalen , HammerMultiplayer 10/10 zu 2 oder meherer im Team, macht das ganze nocheinmal um eine Spur cooler...Kann das Spiel nur weiter Empfehlen ...LGBaXterhttps://www.twitch.tv/baxterck

Третьего дня, по поводу получения ключика от комрада, была установлена новая мегаигра основанная на Путьискатель — Путьискатель гнев праведников. Сразу же, задыхаясь от жадности, ключ был вставлен в Стим цепкими лапами и игра вскоре скачана после официального выхода. Загрузка в меню, моё почтение, дало флешбеки со времен первой чаcти Путьискателя, но настоящей глыбой было меню создания персонажа, теперь оно было сделано более лучше. Даже мой разум, привыкший к ДнД и прочим игровым система кроме Путьискатель, отказывался принимать все осознание с первого захода. Совместными усилиями с технологическими уверенными пользователями ПК решили проблему лагов нет, не решили, но ощущения при создании персонаже и краше игры, как в первой части — АТАС. Но все же с первой частью не идёт ни в какое сравнение. Кроме того, выбор в редакторе заставит вас задуматься надолго. Пришлось просоздавать персонажа почти день и теперь есть уверенность к решительной готовности к полной бездуховности.Многие дети увидят в игре проявления гомосексуализма и феминизма. Но глупым детям невдомёк, что пеперастия и патриотизм народа бисексуальных Путьискателей — это разные вещиИгра отличная, всем рекомендую к приобретению.Всё это, как водится, точно не реклама.
Long live the Majesty - right in hell

Третьего дня, по совету проверенных камрадов, была куплена новый мегаигра —  «Вастеланд Тхрии». Сразу же, задыхаясь от жадности, была открыта коробка с ключем цепкими лапками введен в Стим. Размер игры, моё почтение. Настоящей глыбой была графика. Даже мои, привыкшие к суровым реалистичным и графонистым играм, глаза, отказывались принимать осознание, что то что происходит на экране не реальность, а всего лишь игра, с первого захода.https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2211514365Совместными с моим товарищем усилиями забороли проблему с подсоединением в лобби и попали в редактор персонажей. Ощущения — АТАС. С реальной жизнью не идёт ни в какое сравнение. Кроме того, редактор приятно дает создавать персонажей, которые бы оценил каждый левый житель твиттера. Довольными останутся все, особенно микрочеликонегроарийские карлики-ковбои-рейнджеры и конечно же феминистичные троллеФионы!Решительно готовлюсь к новым приключениям в мире пустошей.Многие дети увидят тут проявления ирония и сарказма. Но глупым детям невдомёк, что реальное мнение и юмор — это разные вещи.Игра отличная, всем рекомендую к приобретению.Всё это, как водится, настоящее и проверенное мнение.https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2211518749

This game is very short (20-25 minutes) and so incredibly bizarre. At first, nothing makes sense in The Good Time Garden, but as you progress, you might find yourself reflecting on fundamental life-issues, philosophy, spirituality, metaphysics, long lost memories and Existence itself.You're playing in a garden where breasts are growing like plants, you slap them and they instantly give birth to baby boobs right in front of you.You're playing in a garden where a huge four-eyed butt is staring at you, waiting for you to slap it a couple of times.You're playing in a garden where baby butts joyfully follow you around.You're playing in a garden where you have to keep feeding a fat, hungry lump of flesh.At the end of the game, I believe that you open the door to enlightenment. The secrets of the Universe are finally revealed.This game is a surreal, hilarious hand-drawn masterpiece.CONTROLSYou won't find a MENU nor any information on how to control your little character, so I'll leave this here:⦁ Movement - WASD keys⦁ Slap - SPACEBAR⦁ Water - N⦁ Pick Up/Drop/Feed - M

I would say that Virtual Cottage is more of an app than a game, and a really GREAT one to have! You just let it run in the background and go read/study, get some tasks done or just relax and daydream.𝐈𝐓 𝐎𝐅𝐅𝐄𝐑𝐒 𝐘𝐎𝐔 :⦁ A To-Do List⦁ A Timer⦁ Daylight changes in real time⦁ Soothing atmospheric sounds (like wind, raindrops, snow, fireplace, and of course you can adjust how loud they play)⦁ An AMAZING music library (probably one of the best lo-fi playlists I've heard in a long time)⦁ Pets in your little cottage (you can choose a cat or a dog to keep you company)The bottom line is, I highly recommend this great app! Besides, it's free, so why not give it a try?

I really enjoyed this game, I would say that is both lovely and sad. It's a short story about mental illness, choices and friendship. One of the endings (the positive one) actually made me drop a tear.. for the character, for myself, for all the people out there who are afraid to share what is truly happening inside their hearts.10/10 really nice artwork.10/10 relaxing background music.10/10 recommend it.

After playing this game for a few hours, I'm really trying to understand why it has so many negative reviews. I see that a lot of people complain about the "one unit move per turn" mechanic, but to be honest, that's what makes this game challenging. It determines you to really plan your strategy and think twice about your next move, not just go commando style heads forward into battle. In my opinion, this feature should definitely be considered a plus to the game. Also, I like the constant struggle of keeping your squad alive, because once your men are killed, they stay dead and you need to spend a lot of hard earned cash to recruit new ones and upgrade their skills from scratch. This is also part of the challenge to use your head and tactics instead of jumping from tile to tile and randomly pressing buttons. Overall, I'm really enjoying this game and would recommend it to anyone who's a fan of turn-based strategy games, and of course, of the Netflix show.  GAMEPLAY ⦁ Interactive turn-based system⦁ Features two campaigns, switch between Narcos and the DEA⦁ Variety of units with special skills⦁ Story-driven prologue⦁ Good graphics⦁ Good mechanics

Armello takes a new look at the digital fantasy board game. It incorporates RPG elements, card games, strategy games, turn‑based combat, and dungeon grinding. The character art is reminiscent of Disney’s animated Robin Hood, with the weapon-baring animals conjuring the same nostalgia. It’s a fantastic aesthetic that adds a lot of personality, charm and uniqueness to the digital board game. Furthermore, an enchanting soundtrack does a great job of portraying the medieval setting.The combat is a mixture of random dice rolls, character stats, and any cards you have in your possession that you’re willing to play. It’s an ideal balance of luck and tactics.With the adventuring, the medieval fantasy setting and the fight for the throne, Armello invokes "Game of Thrones", "Magic the Gathering" and "Risk", and delivers precisely the kind of experience you’d expect from such a combination. The acts of cruelty you can perform are devious, the adventuring bold and heroic, and the twists as you flit between victory condition paths unforeseeable and sudden. It’s a great drama to witness and play. GAMEPLAY ⦁ Variety of heroes with unique abilities⦁ Hex tile design⦁ Day/Night cycle⦁ Huge replayability⦁ Four victory option⦁ Interactive turn-based system⦁ Cards⦁ Story-driven prologue⦁ Fair multiplayer ⦁ Luck and random number generator

Super dichtes, atmosphärisches Spiel. Ich liebe sowieso die Kulisse - daher hatte das Spiel einige Pluspunkte bei mir. Viele negative Reviews erwähnen den fehlenden Horror-Aspekt. Dem stimme ich zu, es ist wirklich außer der grandiosen Atmo sehr wenig Horror im Spiel, man erschreckt sich eigentlich nie. Dafür ist die Story aber rundum gut erzählt, es wird nie langweilig durch diesen schönen Wald zu wandern und einmal kann man das Spiel aufjedenfall durchzocken. Ich wollte bis zum Ende wissen wo der Sohn dieser Mutter ist und es wurde durch Hinweise, kleine Rätsel auch nie langweilig. Bisher auch in der Form noch kein Spiel entdeckt und daher ist das eins, das ich weiterempfehlen würde! Es muss nicht immer nur offensichtlicher Horror sein, es geht auch anders, leider passt das einigen nicht was man irgendwie nachvollziehen kann, es ist kein Resident Evil und kein Outlast - das steht fest! Dennoch gelungen und eine kleine Indie-Horror Perle für zwischendurch. Wenn man sich auf das Spiel und die Story einlassen kann, nicht zu hohe Erwartungen an den Horror-Aspekt hat, wird sein Spaß bei dem Spiel haben. Für das volle Erlebnis, unbedingt in der Nacht mit Kopfhörern zocken.

Sehr geiles Horrorspiel. Atmosphäre, Grafik und Aufbau der Story ist wirklich sehr gut durchdacht und sehr schön umgesetzt. Ich habe das Ende etwas zu bemängeln, es sollte / musste natürlich Tempo aufgebaut werden und schneller werden um es zum spannenden Finale zu führen, aber der Kampf mit ****** war sehr kurz und zu schnell vorbei. Ich konnte kaum mein Arsenal an Munition verballern und die ganze gesparte Munition einsetzen, da hätte man einen coolen, längeren Endboss-Kampf draus machen können mit verschiedenen Angriffsmethoden, vielleicht sogar mit anschließender Verwandlung in ein großes Monster um es danach geschwächt dann die Injektion zu verabreichen, dass hätte das Spiel wohl perfekt gemacht und ich würde das Spiel überall mit 10/10 bewerten. Aber so ist es leider "nur" eine 8/10 und es hat  trotzdem wirklich richtig viel Spaß gemacht & extrem gefesselt. Ich bin froh das sich die Entwickler mal neu ausprobiert haben, da Resi 5+6 ja mit der Spielmethode immer mehr abgeflacht und stumpf geworden sind. Das Erlebnis wurde immer weniger nachhaltig, spaßig und unnovativ. Hiermit haben sie sich wohl selbst übertroffen und sowas soll erst mal ein Horrorspiel-Entwickler nachmachen, Hut ab! Oulast 2 ist ja leider durch flache, schlecht umgesetzte Story untergegangen aber Resi 7 ist wirklich großartig. Ein muss für jeden Horror-Survival Fan!

Das ist definitiv das beste Horror-Survival-Story Game das ich je gespielt habe. Survival zieht sich durch die ganze Story, es gibt kaum Momente in denen der Körper nicht vor Angst gezittert hat. Ich hatte noch nie so ein bedrückendes, angsteinflößendes Gefühl bei einem Horrorspiel gefühlt. Außer Outlast hat dies bisher noch kein einziges Spiel geschafft! Dadurch das die Bedrohung meistens um einen herum ist und nicht vor einem, hört das auch nie auf. Das ganze gepaart mit super tollen, interessanten Rätseln und einer packenden Story erschafft es das wohl beste Alien Spiel aller Zeiten. Ich habe die gesamte Spielzeit gestaunt und das Finale war so unheimlich gruselig und packend, bei meinen Top 3 teilt sich dieses Spiel den 1. Platz mit Outlast und Amnesia.
Richtiger Rotz !! Das ist ein Spiel für alle die TRASH GAMES lieben!!

Ich liebe dieses Spiel - Einfach eine extrem gute Abwechslung nach 300std Dead By Daylight... Da in DbD als Survivor zu Spielen für mich kaum einen Reiz mehr hat, da man kaum Interaktion mit anderen Überlebenden haben kann, außer man spielt mit seinen Freunden. Das fehlt mir sehr dort und The Deceit bringt das Feature zurück und das auch noch Kostenlos! Es lebt einfach von witzigen Gesprächen, Manipulation, auffälligen Aktionen... Und vieeel Atmosphäre & schöner Grafik. Es macht tierisch Spaß, es ist perfekt für Anfänger geeignet und für Horror-Fans ein MUSS! Ein Spiel das durch die viele, witzige Interaktion mit fremden Leuten auch ohne seine eigenen Freunde extrem viel Spaß macht.

DAS SPIEL IST GENAUSO SCHEIßE WIE ALLE ANDEREN LETZTEN TEILE ZUVOR AUCH!- Die Animationen 1:1 Übernommen genau wie die schlechte Engine. Grafik ist wie von 2013.- Mini Maps- Man kriegt kaum nh Übersicht weil direkt 5 Gegner vor dir quer durch laufen. Und alles viel zu schnell geht.- Einfach dumm drauf ballern reicht vollkommen aus.- Die Runden sind so kurz, ich seile länger einen ab als wie die Runden hier dauern.3 Jahre lang daran gearbeitet? Ach du Scheiße. Absolute Enttäuschung, Gottseidank gab es die kostenlose Beta um vorgewarnt zu sein.

Ganz klar - das Zombie-Survival Spiel mit dem größten Potenzial! Miscreated wurde mitlerweile released, so wie man das mitbekommen hat? Meine gesamte Spielzeit beläuft sich auf die Alpha Version und den Verlauf zwischen den Jahren. Ich habe lange gedacht das sich bei Miscreated nicht viel tun wird. Es hat als grandioses Early-Access angefangen und sich stetig weiterentwickelt. Die Map wurde erweitert, die Fahrzeuge wurden verdreifacht. Animationen sind viele vorhanden, das Spielgefühl ähnelt sehr dem Vorreiter DayZ. Für mich ist aber Miscreated definitiv gelungen, es hat sich viel verändert, die Entwickler legen viel Wert auf ein realistisches Spiel. Es gibt viele Funktionen (Hunger,Durst, Radioaktivität, Lebensmittelvergiftung, etc..) die das Spiel wirklich interessant machen. Außerdem die Möglichkeit verschiedene Tiere zu Jagen und zu verspeisen. Die Grafik ist mit Abstand die beste die es je bei einem Zombie-Survival Spiel das in der Open-World spielt, gegeben hat. Dies trägt sehr zur Amtosphäre bei die wirklich unangefochten gelungen ist. Das Spiel hat mittlerweile ein fortschrittliches Base-Building System, dass mit Rezepten erweitert werden kann. Einzig allein was ich umständlich und blöd geregelt finde, ist das Metall-Basebuilding. Die Teile müssen gefunden und mit einem Fahrzeug weggezogen werden. Es gibt Metallschrott im Spiel, der sich super zum craften eignen würde, leider war es den Entwicklern doch wohl zu viel Arbeit da eine dringende Lösung definitiv notwendig war, bei den ganzenm Dieben, Plünderern die einem jeden Tag die Holz-Base aufgebrochen haben. Im Jetzigen Zustand ist das Spiel einfach super, man kann auch Anbauen (Gärtnerei - Gemüse) und es hat sich wirklich sehr gut entwickelt. Leider könnte die Map größer sein, meiner Meinung nach noch zu klein für ein dauerhaftes spaßiges Spielerlebnis. Obwohl die Map in anderen Spielen (zB. wie Infestation) auch in nicht allzu großer Größe wunderbar funktioniert hat. Das lag dort aber wahrscheinlich am vereinfachten PVP - der nie langweilig wird. Es gibt ein extrem vielfältiges Wettersystem (Sandsturm, Radioaktiver Sturm, Schnee, Sonnenschein-Regen,..) der wirklich sehr schön umgesetzt wurde. Ich bin gespannt was noch dazu kommt und bin bisher wirklich zufrieden, leider gibt es immer mehr Flops in der Richtung, weshalb Miscreated schon eine kleine Bereicherung ist.

Ein Spiel das mit viel Liebe gemacht wurde! Es macht wahnnsinig Spaß sich seine eigene Base aufzubauen und die Welten zu erkunden. Es bietet so viele Möglichkeiten und Abwechslung wie manch fertige Spiele nicht! Ich kann kaum glauben das es eine Pre-Alpha ist. Ich liebe dieses Spiel, diese magische Atmosphäre und der malerische Grafikstil mit hübschen Farben und schönen Kontrasten, ich hoffe das die Entwickler daraus einen richtigen Diamanten machen werden! Es steckt sooooooviel Potenzial drinnen, ich bin mir sicher das wird ein grandioses Spiel & ist jetzt schon einer meiner absoluten Lieblingsspiele aus dem Jahr 2016! Wie ein kleines "Happy End" für das letzte Jahr, Danke "System Era Softworks" für dieses wunderschöne Weltraumspiel! Das einzige was ich leider bemängeln muss... Ich hab im Spiel mit weitester Sichtentfernung ca. 60 Fps gehabt, mittlerweile (da man viel gebaut hat) muss ich auf kurzer Distanzsichtung bei ca. 25-35 Fps spielen...Trotzdem klare Klare Kaufempfehlung, wer Weltraumspiele mag sollte nicht lange überlegen, sofort zugreifen!

Death is a great teacher. Failure in Counter-Strike: Global Offensive is, as it always has been for this series, the greatest way to learn where you should have gone, what you shouldn't have done, and how you could have done better. Counter-Strike players spend a lot of time learning -- consequently, they are always getting better.Growth is an important factor in Global Offensive, especially if you're coming into Counter-Strike fresh or after a sabbatical. This is an extremely hardcore, skill-based first-person shooter, and it forces you to think differently than other modern shooters. If you’re a Call of Duty player, you’re going to need to change your play style to succeed here. Counter-Strike also tries developing into something new here as well, despite doing little to push itself beyond what it’s always done best. Global Offensive modifies old maps to keep veterans on their toes, and introduces official new modes that encourage different play styles for the first time in almost 15 years.For the uninitiated, Counter-Strike: Global Offensive is a small-scale, team-based first-person shooter with permanent death. When a counter-terrorist kills a terrorist planting explosives in a classic Defusal match, or a CT escort swallows a sniper round in Hostage Rescue, the victim is dead for good and doesn't respawn until the next round. As such, players on both sides must exercise skill and care. The bomb objective, meanwhile, gives everyone a purpose. Of course matches end when everyone on a team is dead, but a clever and coordinated terrorist team will give the CTs the slip, plant their bomb, and protect the bomb site. Between rounds, everyone spends earned cash on better gear and guns, and the cycle continues.Pieces of the Counter-Strike formula are dated at this point, but the superb heart and soul of Global Offensive is timeless. Teams are small, guns are lethal, and rounds are short. There's an addictive just-one-more-round quality to it, because there's a constant desire to do better than last time, to earn a satisfying kill, or to win in a new way. Call of Duty and Battlefield vets will wonder why they can't sprint to escape enemy fire or look down the iron sights to improve aim; Counter-Strike players will feel like they walked into their redecorated home. Certain map redesigns will catch hardcore fans off guard, but the changes are for the best -- the underpass choke point in de_dust, for instance, has a new escape route.Even in the face of genre evolution, Global Offensive doesn’t care to adapt. CSGO is so dedicated to Counter-Strike's aging ideals despite market and trend changes that it brute-forces its way to success. Part of what makes it such an engaging competitive game is that killing in Global Offensive requires a wholly different skill set than other shooters. Everyone is limited to what they have and can see, with little room for character modification or on-the-fly advantages. Running and gunning is a useless play style, even if you've bought a helmet and kevlar that round, to the point that someone standing still is more likely to score the kill. Walking, crouching, or standing are your best bets to reduce the inaccurate spray of machine-gun fire.Consequently, killing in Global Offensive feels good. There's a sickening sensation to dropping someone dead because you know they're not coming back. It's also satisfying knowing you used limited resources to play smarter than your victim. If players aren't watching corners, providing covering fire, or using smoke grenades and flashbangs, they're more likely to take a headshot from a more delicate and patient triggerman. The desire to experience that distinct feeling is a strong motivator to keep playing, even when you're getting steamrolled by an obviously better team.If you've played Counter-Strike before, Global Offensive probably sounds a whole lot like Counter-Strike. Like Counter-Strike: Source before it, Global Offensive exists simply to modernize the look of the classic competitive shooter, while doing little to disrupt the core form and function. At the same time, it does enough to color outside the lines of tradition to justify your time and effort.

For me, Terraria is a 2D Adventure-Story game. You start off as a simple human, overcoming many obsacles, until you can be the best dark or light magician spawning creatures to fight for you, or have the best sword currently in the game and slash stuff and be the king. You can choose your way in many ways. You can build, kill and even dig stuff. It doesn't have sotry elements, but killing the bosses one after another makes me do that by myself. The best part is this game is now alive again. It has had many updates since 1.2 which was the biggest update ever.Music - Awesome, suits the game in many ways. Favorite: Underground Mushroom Biome.Graphics - Very awesome, pixelated in a good way, the game looks much nicer in pixels than 1080p non-pixelated graphics.World Design - The backrounds are awesome as well as interacting with the world (breaking objects) makes you feel inside it.A.I. - The enemies are not stupid at all, they can see you. Amazing too.There's no story or cutscenes, because it doesn't need to. It's too much awesomeness for a game. If you're looking to buy it, please, check the 1.2 trailer on this page and you will change your mind.Terraria. Awesome game to spend your time, but better with friends.A masterpiece without the need of next-gen graphics. 10/10

This is a well made, stylized, team based first person shooter. Teamwork is needed to win at higher levels of play, though lone wolfing is fine on lower skill levels such as on most public servers. There are 9 classes to choose from. Each class has unique weapons and abilities that allow each to fill a unique roll as part of a larger team. This provides for a challenging and rewarding experience when faced against opponents of similar or better skill levels.There are two official modes of play: player versus player and 'Mann Versus Machine'.Player versus player is a mode where one team of players battles against another team of players. Within this mode, there are different types of maps. Each type of map has it's own objectives for both teams to achieve.'Mann Verses Machine' is a mode where a team of up to 6 players battles against waves of bots. Players collect money from destroyed bots. The money is divided equally among players in the team and can be used to purchase upgrades and abilities for the next wave of bots. The pay to play sub-mode, "Mann Up", gives rewards upon completing a "tour".In addition to the official modes of play, there are several player made mods that introduce other modes of play such as 'Versus Saxton Hale', where a team of players battles against a player playing as a character named Saxton Hale; 'Dodge Ball', where two teams of players playing as Pyros must airblast rockets and other projectiles back and forth in order to stay alive; 'Zombie Mod', where a team of players must make it to the end of the map without dying to zombies that are played by other players; to name just a few of the many player made mods available.In addition to game play, players will randomly receive free items from the game. Some of the free items given out are weapons, hats and crates. Hats can be worn by a class to change the appearance of that class. Crates can be opened with a key. Keys can be purchased from the Mann Co Store or from the Steam Community Market or traded for from another player. Most crates will list which items can be found within them.

Encore une fois cette année beaucoup de critiques négatives, mais comment c'est possible, ce jeu est juste indescriptible ???Je m'explique :On a la chance d'être considéré comme des joueurs de seconde zone car on a une version au rabais, genre même un PC à 3000 euros n'a pas le droit à une version next gen et c'est super bien pour notre vie IRL !!!On a plein de vidéos sur Youtube sur comment créer son profil de joueur idéal avec des nouveaux menus/stats et ben tout ça c'est pas pour nous, non non non, nous on a juste la mise à jour des effectifs pour 60 euros merci 2K c'est tellement prévenant.Vous pouvez jouer en Hall of Fame et comme l'année dernière gagner des matchs avec 40 à 50 points d'avance, tranquille on ne fatigue pas nos petits doigts tout mignon (ou biscornus) sur la manette, merci 2K c'est si gentil pour notre arthrose future.L'incohérence des timings c'est juste jouissif, un lancer franc à 99% ne rentre pas mais un lancer franc à 49% lui peut rentrer, ben ça c'est super pour les chauves qui n'ont pas à s'arracher les cheveux, merci 2K de penser à notre cuir chevelu.Et je ne parlerai pas des tirs à 3 points c'est une franche rigolade à chaque partie !!!Bref je recommande après 93 heures de jeu, une fois la pilule avalée il reste à peu près un an pour la faire descendre et qui sait avoir le droit d'être considéré en tant que joueur par 2K.Et en plus j'ai changé la sonnerie de mon téléphone en bruit de pigeon et ça, ça n'a pas de prix.Bon jeu à tous !!!

Après plus de 2000 h de jeu sur SWTOR je vais laisser un avis positif, parce qu'après tout j'y ai quand même laissé une partie de ma vie sur ce jeu. Etant fan de l'univers Star Wars je ne pouvais pas passer à côté lors de sa sortie, je n'avais jamais touché un MMO à part WOW pendant 2 petits mois d'essai et puis s'en va. J'avais d'abord accroché le mode histoire des différentes classes en solo (8 au total, 4 côté république et 4 côté Empire), puis ensuite j'ai pu rejoindre une guilde comme ça pour papoter et on a plus lâché avec mes amis des 4 coins de la France, du Canada et de la Belgique, bref plus de vie IRL.Donc pour résumer si vous voulez du solo ou du MMO et que vous aimez Star Wars vous pouvez y aller les yeux fermés ^^Bon jeu à tous !
Que puis-je dire de ce TransOcean à part que c'est un jeu un peu bateau...Voila, voila...Désolé...

Je vais laisser une évaluation positive car je ne comprends pas comment on peut autant détester ce jeu.Bon mon évaluation sera uniquement sur les menus, car impossible de faire un match le jeu crash avant d'y accéder.Vraiment les devs ont fait un joli menu, si je met le stick vers la droite ça va à droite, et encore plus fou si je vais à gauche le stick va à gauche aussi, et ça répond rapidement c'est vraiment un menu fluide et ça fait plaisir !!On peu aussi modifier les paramètres du jeu que l'on ne verra jamais, ce qui laisse une vrai imagination des graphismes, franchement bien pensé dit donc.J'ai pu quand même regarder 2KTV, tout n'est donc pas perdu non plus, du coup je suis trop impatient de voir la prochaine vidéo, ils ont réussi à me rendre accro je n'attends plus que ça j'y pense tout le temps.Ah oui quand le jeu plante c'est quand on choisit un match, de créer son équipe ou son joueur donc éviter de choisir quelque chose à faire et profitez de la musique et de ce merveilleux menu.Enfin pour finir le jeu crash proprement, on voit la tout le travail effectué par 2K, le retour à windows est super propre, pas besoin de redémarrage on se retrouve sur la page Steam comme si de rien était en un éclair. Franchement c'est beau j'ai pas de mots, du coup je peux reprendre ma vie de Geek.Ne soyez pas trop dur avec 2K, n'oubliez pas que chaque année c'est la galère qu'au début, c'est vrai aussi au milieu quelquefois et parfois à la fin pour certain, mais ce menu est vraiment mega fluide, le meilleur menu depuis des années !!

J'ai vraiment hésité à laisser une évaluation positive, mais finalement oui car c'est un excellent jeu avec beaucoup d'action et un rythme soutenu tout au long du jeu. 3 types de zombie, Lickers, 2 types de Hunter, les Drain Demos qui remplacent les araignées, les chiens et le quasi immortel Nemesis le bestiaire est quand même intéressant malgré les critiques.J'ai eu beaucoup de plaisir à y jouer, peut-être le meilleur RE dans l'action. Jill est vraiment Badass, elle assure et c'est vraiment plaisant de jouer ce genre de héro à la Lara Croft.Pas de moments de réflexion, c'est vraiment dommage car les énigmes même facile sont dans l'ADN de RE. J'ai terminé le jeu sans me presser ni tout débloquer en 5 heures, c'est court !Des passages du jeu d'origine (1999) supprimés, mais pourquoi ? Si encore à la place on aurait des temps de jeu supérieur dans des zones existantes mais non même pas, c'est triste.++++ Jill est trop Badass+++ Le rythme soutenu+++ Le Nemesis++ Le moteur du jeu+ Les passages avec Carlos-- Pas d'enigmes--- Des passages supprimés sans rien à la place---- Beaucoup trop court pour un prix AAAEn bref je recommande ce jeu malgré tout, alors peut-être pas à ce prix car ça fait cher l'histoire solo, on paye le prix du multi qui vient s'ajouter avec Resistance et c'est dommageable. On a finalement l'impression que RE3 est un excellent "DLC" à RE2 mais ce n'est pas le cas, il manque 3 bonnes heures pour en faire un très grand jeu, ça reste un bon jeu.

+++ Voir son Jedi devenir plus fort et ressentir cette progression est assez jouissif+++ L'histoire après l'exécution de l'ordre 66++   Les combats en utilisant la force et son sabre++   L'exploration des planètes, les phases sans combat est vraiment sympa+     Que du solo pour un Star Wars ça date-      La durée de vie, environ 15 h pour la quête principale, c'est court mais autant qu'un Tomb Raider (2013) ou qu'un Uncharted finalement.--     Pas de quêtes secondaires, juste des collectibles à récupérer, bien dommageDans l'ensemble un excellent jeu, si on est fan on ne peut qu'adorer (je ne comprend pas les "fans" qui n'aiment pas, ce ne sont sont que des imposteurs, misericorde on nous ment encore sacrebleu, bigre !!!). Il ne manque pas grand chose pour en faire un jeu extraordinaire, vraiment dommage, mais je recommande quand même. Bon jeu à ceux qui tente de se lier à la force !

Un bon jeu dans l'ensemble qui évolue avec des mises à jour fréquentes, ça rappel un peu les émissions de rénovation que l'on peut regarder sur la TNT, ça aurait pu être marrant d'acheter aux enchères nos maisons mais il y a déjà un bon choix et régulièrement des ajouts.+++ Acheter une maison et la refaire++   De multiples possibilités+     On améliore ses compétences (un peu vite)-      Les cafards (j'aime pas les cafards)--     Un peu répétitif

Un excellent jeu d'ASOBO, très beau graphiquement avec une histoire prenante. Les deux personnages principaux sont attachant tout comme les personnages secondaires qui ont des spécificités utiles lors de certains passages du jeu. On se laisse vite guider et il est difficile de décrocher avant la fin. Le jeu est court mais peut être aussi parce qu'il est bon, on ne s'ennuie pas une seule fois, et quand on le termine on est un peu orphelin lol.+++ L'univers sombre, la bande son (musique et doublage)++   Les personnages, Les graphismes+     Le gameplay, l'histoire-      L'IA parfois un peu bête--     Trop court, il faut compter entre 10 et 12 heures pour en venir à bout

Après presque 200 h de jeu je laisse finalement une note négative, je m'explique :Toujours les mêmes défauts depuis l'ajout des matchs 3D :- 3 voir 4 poteaux régulièrement lors des matchs, on est pourtant dans une simulation supposée réaliste ??- Trop souvent des matchs à 30 tirs à 2 pour un résultat de 0-2 ou 1-1 dans le meilleur des cas on peut le comprendre parfois mais pas à presque tous les matchs !- Vendre un joueur c'est souvent bradé dans un club moyen, aucune chance de vendre à sa vrai valeur, par contre pour acheter un joueur moyen il faut surpayer 9 fois sur 10.Pourtant la base de donnée est énorme, ce jeu pourrait être une merveille avec ses nombreuses options, au final le plaisir de jeu n'existe plus on est plus souvent frustré qu'autre chose, vraiment dommage que ce soit des défauts récurrents et jamais corrigé qui nuisent au jeu. Je n'achetais plus qu'un an sur 2 ces 4 dernières années à cause de ça, je n'achèterais plus jamais dorénavant, triste. A moins qu'un jour le nom soit modifié en Frustration Manager la au moins on sait ce que l'on achète ^^

Je recommande :+++ Créer sa propre écurie en partant de rien++   Un Workshop très complet (Vrais noms, photos et sponsors, etc)++   Des règlements qui peuvent changer d'une saison à l'autre avec un système de vote des managers+     Le seul jeu de management de F1 depuis très très longtemps-      Des négociations de sponsors, de pilotes, de salariés plus poussés auraient pu être un plus (comme dans GP World à l'époque)--     Peut paraitre répétitif à la longue---   Des courses pas toujours cohérentes, nos coureurs terminent 1er et 2ème puis la course d'après les 2 bons derniers, justifié par le fait que le circuit n'est pas fait pour notre chassis (Trop de différences)

Ok, so here's my two cents.. Overall, I like the idea behind this sim because who doesn't like building PCs, coming up with new builds, experimenting with various parts etc. BUT the problem is, that I feel like the sim gets bland very quickly way too soon. The free build mode is nice to try out different things and to see whether they are actually going to work and how the setup would look like. The campaign mode is also a pretty interesting idea to keep the whole thing fresh and exciting but tbh ... I really LOVE building PCs, doing something with my own hands and having the unbelievable excitement when you push the power button and it actually works. I realised pretty quickly that this cannot give me the same enjoyment - it doesn't even come close. Which is why I realised after only having one hour played that it is just not for me. Please don't get me wrong though. You can see that the devs put a lot of work and effort into this sim and I'm pretty confident that they'll keep improving stuff and adding new things. It just wasn't the right fit for me at a price tag of 20 bucks. There was nonetheless one thing I was wondering about.. I didn't really like the campaign mode personally but I thought that the free build is a pretty cool feature if you just want to try out a build (somewhat like a visualised version of pc partpicker). So I was wondering whether it would be possible to make the free build mode a standalone f2p mode (maybe funded through advertisements of hardware companies?!) for people who wanna get a feel and idea for their next build before they buy there new parts. I'd definitely use that every time I want to build a new PC. At the end of the day, I feel like this is a neat simulator with huge potential. While it just wasn't the right fit for me at the price tag of 20 EUR (since I didn't enjoy the campaign mode and the free build mode still seems a bit too limited atm), I still feel like it could be a cool experience for people into pc building or someone who's trying to get into pc building. Therefore, I'm leaving a thumbs up nonetheless.Curious where this will be in a couple of months. :)

Well, what can I say? Playing this game ever since release has kinda been an emotional rollercoaster. Although I did uninstall the game multiple times, I always came back to it. I even wrote a pretty angry and disappointed review back in June last year and thought that I was done for good with the game. But even after a break of a couple of months, it managed to pull me back in again. I guess, if I wouldn't be able to still be playing the game with the same group of friends I started back when PUBG released, I wouldn't have come back in the first place, but I gotta say: I'm glad I did, since - to me - the game feels better than it ever did before. I totally agree that there are still major issues with the game and that it still is (and probably always will be) far from being a fully polished and perfect game, but it is nonetheless still the best BR out there and I'm happy Bluehole seems to actually be listening to their players again. Dear devs, the last couple of patches have been a HUGE improvement again - let's hope you can keep doing as well in the future! Many thanks for hundreds of hours of fun (mostly). <3P.S.: I do recommend playing this in squad mode with three friends (or at least duos with one of your mates) to get the most out of it.

The idea itself is pretty neat especially since PUBG is currently lacking a similar training mode and the core experience it offers for the low price is actually pretty solid. However, Battle Royale Trainer (BRT) still needs a lot of improvements to feel like an accurate training sim for this ever so popular genre. I guess although that it's referring to the genre Battle Royale itself, (looking at the design and weapon choices etc.) it's trying to offer a training mode specifically for PUBG-players. Therefore, my review is focused on the perspective of a PUBG-player, who might be interested in a training mode like this. TL;DR: Your best bet so far but nowhere near to the actual game. Needs a lot of tweaking or you won't see any improvements in your actual play style. 1. Weapons: The weapons need a lot of tweaking as they currently don't really feel anywhere close to the ones in PUBG. People have been talking about weapon spray etc. before but my main concern is with ballistics, bullet velocity etc. when practicing long-distance shots. My main problem currently with PUBG is that I most of the time don't get enough time to practice my sniping skills with the various weapons and scope combinations. I really do hope that in the future the devs are trying to bring the feel of the weapons inside BRT as close to PUBG as possible.2. Sound design: Although the sound design of PUBG is nowhere near perfect and has been complained about a lot in the past, it is still very crucial for these kind of games and should therefore also be accurately represented in BRT. Currently I am finding it very hard to track down shooters while being shot at and sometimes can't even locate them when I'm actually looking straight at them. ALSO: Please let me disable the main menu music!!!3. Visibility: I find it pretty hard to find any targets on the woodlands map - mostly due to the way shadows and lighting work atm and the map design itself. I think it probably needs a few adjustments regarding terrain (maybe more open fields with rocks as hiding spots and on the other hand less trees?). Also, how bout different map sizes or a map size that increases or decreases depending on how many bots you choose? Currently I find it pretty hard to track down any enemies on woodlands when I set the number very low to like 5 or 10.These were my initial thoughts. Overall, this is your best bet so far if you want to practice some BR-style shooting or simply warm up for PUBG outside of an actual round BUT it just feels too far away from the actual game atm, which raises doubts that you will gain any valuable skill improvements with its current state. I would give a neutral rating for now if that'd be possible on steam but I just can't recommend BRT in its current state. I will nonetheless keep revisiting it regularly to check out improvements and I'm pretty sure that the devs will be able to create something valuable for everyone if they keep listening to the players and adjust BRT accordingly. So long, take care and see you on the battleground!

OK, so I realise that most of the negative reviews are linked to the argument that there is not enough content that justifies the current price tag of this game. Although I have to admit that I was lucky enough to win this game during a twitter raffle, I can now - after nearly 18 hours of playtime - say that I don't think this is overpriced. Please bare in mind that I have never played Wanderlust: Rebirth so I can't tell whether there is much difference between both titles, but this game by itself is actually great fun and after nearly 18 hours I am still not bored of playing this, which is a good deal for a game at 11 quid, I'd say. Sure, the bosses on 'normal' difficulty are not the hardest, some NPCs tend to be imbalanced and you can play through the main story in about 7-8 hours. Nonetheless, you need to consider that there is so much more to this game than just the main story. There are actually quite a few dungeons hidden around the map with a lot of loot and their respective mini-bosses. Also, I am thrilled to find/craft the best gear possible as well as figuring out the best skill set for my character. Even if all that is not enough for you, you will be able to compete in the arena fights and although I thought, my character is already pretty awesome I am still miles a way from that 'round 20' achievement. Apart from singleplayer, I recently started to play this with some other guys and I think that's the most brilliant thing about this game. Raiding dungeons and fighting bosses is even more fun if you are in a group. I played a big chunk of the main story again right after I finished it in singleplayer and I enjoyed it even more. Especially, as one of the players showed us some dungeons that we hadn't heard of before. And then there is obviously also 'epic' difficulty to give you and your friends a bigger challenge (and better loot). Last but not least, I think it's great that the dev is still so engaged and keeps constantly releasing bugfixes. Sure, there are still some glitches and the game is not perfect but I am sure it will still be improved along the way.So overall, I can recommend this game as I really enjoyed it so far and I will definitely spend more time playing this. If you are not sure about the price and expect a 20+ hours story for your money, do not buy this (or wait until it's on offer)! But if you like pixel RPGs and want to have some fun with friends or on your own exploring this little entertaining indie title, go for it! I don't think you'll regret it.

First of all, please excuse my playtime. I had previously read the Japanese version of the game, and I wanted to first support the developers and people who worked on it and secondly, to write this review.I simply wanted to say that I had several breakdowns while playing this game. All of the heartbreaks and sorrow ensure that I will not forget the story (or stories) anytime soon. But it wasn't all tears and grief; you also got to laugh along the way as comic relief was sprinkled throughout. Regardless, the game can be very depressing at times, and while you may feel like all you're getting is suffering, I truly want you to persevere and make it to the finish. The finale may or may not be satisfying, but I found myself smiling at the end. I'm aware of the controversy around this release, I myself enjoy adult content in visual novels, hence I can see how it would deter people from buying this product.  But I do believe the story will make up for it.Lastly, I just wanna say that the vocal OST of this game is just amazing. Love all the OPs and EDs of all the cases! yuki is such an amazing vocalist! Also obligatory best girl (beside case-0) is Olivia for me!Now if only I could brainwash myself so that I could experience everything again...

If you've seen Shirobako, Ninki Seiyuu is similar in that it allows us to get a closer and more thorough look at how the things we love come to life. In this case specifically: seiyuus or voice acting. For the most part, the narrative was lighthearted and entertaining. Of course, there was drama here and there, but they did a nice job of not dragging it out too long. The characters were lovable, and the interaction between the casts was fantastic. Overall, the VN is surprisingly good, but I wish it could have been a little longer.The art style was what drew me to this VN. It is, without a doubt, quite appealing and attractive. I did some research on the artist and discovered that they've just worked on Ninki Seiyuu thus far. I genuinely hope they will begin working on a new project in the near future.Shiravune's team has been on fire lately, bringing us plenty of new titles. Although their translations might have been a little too liberal at times, I get the impression that the translating team is having a good time with it, and I appreciate their efforts. Keep up the good work, Shiravune!

When you read VNs to escape real life responsibilities, but the VN is about real life responsibilities: Does art imitate life, or does life imitate art?After my first playthrough, I believe I got the worst possible ending, and it's depressing. I despise what I'd made of MC, and I despise how I made choices for other characters without considering their feelings. You may scoff, but the story and its characters felt real to me because it was well written.I'm not sure if there's a happy ending in store for me, but I'm going to finish the game regardless.TL;DR: If you enjoy human drama and good music (and I mean really good music), read it and feel the same despair as I did.P/s: Also if you want to stream Dr. Flower music it's available on Spotify!

(I strongly advise reading printemps and été first before automne if you’re new to the series)  (This review contains spoilers!) After 2 years of waiting, we can once again go back to Saint Angraecum Academy; to the beautiful world of yuri that we all love and know too well. However,  Summer  has gone and along with it are the usual joyous feelings that we knew of... Autumn comes. Yuzuriha, the almighty and seemingly invincible president is the protagonist this time around. It wouldn’t be a stretch to call her the only Prince in the Academy. But it turns out that everything we knew in  Spring  and  Summer  was all but a facade that Yuzuriha put up to hide her own timidness and fragility. Yuzuriha, who seems like a hero that will save those in need of her help is in fact, the one who needs her very own hero instead.Nerine, the sweet and caring vice-president that we all have taken for granted. She has and will always be there when Yuzuriha needs her; Neri will always be the hero for Yuzuriha, yet this beautiful relationship has an ugly beginning and only Neri and Neri alone know. In her eyes she has manipulated and changed Yuzuriha so much that the guilt does not allow her to seek salvation. The only one who could free her from her own misery is none other than Yuzuriha.Autumn is a melancholy season. It’s the season of changes; people generally prefer status quo to changing something in their lives. But only through changes can we mature and better ourselves as a human being. Reading automne, to be perfectly honest, has been an angsty and bittersweet journey. It is nothing like printemps and été. But I’m glad I got to experience this. Erika, Chidori, Suoh, Rikka, Ringo, Ichigo. Everyone has grown so much ever since we met them in printemps. And last but not least, Yuzuriha and Neri, both have sacrificed so much for each other but it was well worth it. The ending was emotional and it really touched my heart. Finally, Winter has arrived. Again,  See everyone in 2 years ;~;

Now that I'm done with all the routes, time to write down a well-deserved review for this game.tl;dr:  With a wholesome and fulfilling story for each of the main heroines along with a great cast of supporting characters, Aokana is definitely one of the more safer choices when it comes to "What should I read next". The Story The story in Aokana is simple so it's quite easy to follow. In fact, for the most part it almost becomes too predictable. However, Aokana is not about the destination, it's about the journey. Throughout each route, you get to see not only the growth of the girl but Masaya (MC) himself; both as a FC player and a person. The Heroines Here's my brief opinion about each girl, as well as the route order I did for my playthrough and the route order I personally recommend:  Asuka  : Asuka is almost too pure and innocent; the same thing can be said about her love for the sport as well as her motivation. She can be ditzy at times but that's what's so charming about her. Also I can't stress how much I love random Asuka's noise.  Rika  : The friendly girl next door. Rika is kind and diligent but this is also her biggest weakest. Personally I think Rika's route is plain and is the weakest among the 4 but I don't dislike it. Sorry Rika's fans.  Mashiro  : At first I wasn't excited at all about her character cause it seemed like it wouldn't function properly without Misaki's support. But I'm glad I was wrong. Mashiro has the most touching story and she really is the best kouhai you could ask for.  Misaki  : Misaki is bae. That's all I have to say.I finished the game with that exact order. Now, If I were to recommend the order I think would be the best, it has to be Rika/Mashiro -> Asuka -> Misaki. Rika and Mashiro's stories are unrelated to the overall plot so you can choose whoever you want. Misaki should be played last so you can truly experience her character development.  R18 Patch I don't really know why but I gotta make a dedicated section for this.There is a free patch up on NekoNyan's official website if you wish to restore the hscenes to your steam version of the game. At first I really thought that it wasn't necessary to play Aokana with hscenes restored as weird as it may sound. I went with Asuka route first and for the most part the story revolved heavily around FC and sport in general so the romance aspect of the game wasn't at all prominent. Naturally this makes Asuka hscene kinda forced and it felt like they have it for the sake of having it. Rika and Mashiro didn't get much better treatment either. Misaki however, this I can approve of. Again, as weird as it sounds, Misaki route has a proper eroge feel to it so her hscene makes sense. At this point I know I'm not making any sense but if you make it this far thank you.  In conclusion I think Aokana is great and you can't really go wrong with picking this up. Special shout-out to our adorable manager Madoka who makes every scene she appears in 10x more interesting!

Смесь стратегии с шутером. Задумка необычная, положительно отмечу присутствие редактора, возможность создать свою "сцену"ну и на этом всё.Должно быть разработчика часто обижали, иначе не знаю чем можно объяснить настолько дисбалансные миссии в которых тебе буквально дают 1 шт. бронированную технику (танк или бмп), отряд пехоты - твоя цель выполнить несколько банальных задач по типу (захвати то, доберись до туда), при этом противник получает постоянно подкрепления, возможно успех играет в скорости выполнения задач? - но нет же, делаешь всё быстро, технику теряешь незамедлительно от рпг, делаешь не торопясь - ты все равно её теряешь от рпг, но попозже (ибо бесконечный поток противника не дадут тебе толком продвигаться). Нет возможности получить какое-то подкрепление и тд. Ну да ладно....Задание с аэропортом, "танковое сражение" тут 2 основные задачи, захватить 4 ангара, не дать взлететь 4м самолётам - ок. Управляешь 1 танком, + 3 танка союзника и 1-2 бмп, очень много техники противника которые будут мешать, игра говорит - "уничтожь их" - ок. Уничтожаю, быстро не получится ибо вас просто разнесут. Уничтожил. Я молодец - миссия провалена "4 самолета успели взлететь". ПЕРЕИГРАТЬ!Стараюсь двигаться активнее к полосам взлета, их тут 3! и самолеты появляются рандомно, на танке надо еще и доехать успеть, сам самолет толком не разгоняется. Какая-то больная фантазия у разработчиков, почему-то самолет проезжает 5 метров и тут же поднимается в воздух! и в воздухе начинает разгоняться! - выглядит это дело нелепо. Если по физике у разработчика была твердая "2", это к беде дамы и господа. В итоге то, пытаясь двигаться активнее (не заостряя много внимания на вражеской технике) ты обязательно будешь обстрелян, а союзные танки сольются один за другим.Получается у игрока множество вариантов в данной миссии, разнообразие это похвально! а точнее всего 2 варианта: 1 - ты уничтожаешь всю вражескую технику и проигрываешь из-за того, что не успел уничтожить те самые взлетевшие самолёты. 2 - ты торопишься уничтожить эти странные самолёты, которые летают создавая угрозу всем познаниям человека в физике, но в итоге получаешь снарядами со всех сторон и проигрываешь. Выглядит как программа "сдохни или умри", а что выбрать из этого, решайте сами.
где оптимизация? где патчи ???

CA в своём репертуаре. Игру разработали, оптимизацию не разработали. Заниженные системные требование в описании. Total War превратился в баталии по типу разборок на районе, вот помню, раньше можно было играть в сражении с 10-20к юнитами, пусть и с подкреплениями, но было играбельно и значение слов "total war" имело место быть. Сейчас же сражения в среднем на 2к юнитов и то, местами, с просадками фпс при 7800X/6700XT. Некий Total War больше не чувствуется. Думаю большинство олдов данной серии со мной согласятся.В битвах без поселения средний fps 75 - ок.на карте компании средний fps 55, с просадками до 35 - не ок.в битвах с поселением fps просаживается до 45 - не ок.Жадные CA, настолько жадные, что думают только о заработке, не слушая свою аудиторию геймеров. Жду патч, но учитывая опыт предыдущей части WH2 TW полагаю, что ситуация толком не изменится. Я вот не понимаю. От куда у CA столько талантов так изуродовать оптимизацию, в частности на карте компании - ну что там такого, что карты уровня 6700XT просаживаются до 35 кадров ? RTX тут нет, какой-то ВАУ графики - нет. Даже мыло появилось, которое не наблюдалось во 2-ой части. На других игровых движках с такой графикой на карте компании достаточно будет некой 1050 ti, если оптимизацию сделать руками. Если ваш игровой движок, под названием "Warscape+" не работает как надо. Поменяйте его. Сделайте уже, что-то.

Продолжение одноименной игры.Ожидал большего, честно говоря не далеко ушла от первой части. Визуально игра выглядит хуже чем на картинках, маркетинговый ход привлекать покупателей фотошоп скринами. Онлайн довольно низкий для подобных игр, всего 1500-3000 человек. Обычно такой онлайн сам по себе говорит о "неудачном" проекте.При обновлении игра полностью переустанавливает файлы с проверкой целостности файлов, при всем этом обновляется игра плохо, видимо из-за нагрузки на сервер (интернет хороший). В таком случае проще удалить игру и установить по новой.
