This game has mixed reviews mainly because of its early-access tricks it pulled. This is very important to note when looking at these reviews. People are pissed off because they payed $80+ during the kickstarter, and only got what they were promised much, much later. With that being said, this is actually a decent game. It has gone on sale for $10 or less, and at these prices it is definetly worth picking up. Although it took a long time to get there, it is currently a decent RTS, and is a bloody lot of fun to play as well. The premise of the game is simple. Annihilate. Having such a simple goals keeps the gameplay quite elementary, but allows it to focus on different mechanics. You are constantly at war with whatever other player/AI found themselves in your vicinity, and you will not rest until their planet lies in shambles. And you can literally do that! By nuking them into oblivion, crashing a moon into them or just blowing them up death-star style, planets can be severly damaged or even permanently wiped off of the map! Note: Your friends will get pissed at you if you use an annihilaser on them. Use with caution. The gameplay is also simple. There are 5 kinds of units: air, bots, vehicles, naval and orbital. These pretty much do what they say on the tin, and certain things are best used in specific situations (although bots and vehicles are pretty much interchangable). By creating an army (the biggest usually wins), you constantly attack your opponents base, destroying their resources or factories and giving you an adavantage. The game is won as soon as you kill their commander, while they are trying to do the same to you. If you start out on the same planet (and there are other planets in the system), you can transport or teleport your commander to those planets, only to start a new base and keep him safer. Establish orbital control to stop any hostile orbital fabrication bots from building teleporters and unleashing their entire army upon you. Its a lot of fun, and really easy to get into (*cough* Europa Universalis IV *cough*).Overall, you should definetly get the game if it is on sale. If not, probably best to buy only if you enjoy the RTS genre. It is a lot of fun to play with friends as well as alone, although there are some bugs here and there which are still being patched. I have not found anything gamebreaking so far though, so I think it should be okay. Anyway, it is a good game, and although it did not deliver well during early access (and after launch as well), it is worth picking up now.

Wow, just wow. This game is absolutely incredible. It tells a deep, rich story through the use of signs, which also give you slight hints at the puzzles you are trying to solve. In the beginning of the game, it is more or less "Wow, look at our crazy physics", but later it becomes a true puzzle game. You'll find yourself on other sides of the map by just going through a door, you'll find new ways to solve puzzles by using new tools, you'll find paths that were always there, but you never realised them. It is quite short, but it is a must-play.

With 1.0 coming out tomorrow, there is absolutely no possible reason not to get this game. This is already one of the best games out there, even with it being in early access, and it is bound to get even better. This game allows you to carefully plan a mission, build a rocket and then launch that rocket only to have it spectacularly blow up during a staging procedure. KSP has the potential of being an incredibly in-depth game, while also being a hilarious, mess-em-up explosion bonanza. It is so versatile, and it offers many, many mods to keep you coming back over and over again. Also, the developers have their own platform for modding, and intend to keep away from the paid-mod pile of asshattery. This game is worth 3x its current price. Get it.

Horizon Zero Dawn, one of a few Sony exclusives to get a PC port, a great game in a beautiful package. Already got the platinium on the PS4 Pro version (25h for the story/50h if you want the 100%, DLC is on another map and takes around 15h.)Horizon Zero Dawn is a classic 3rd person view open world with a great story (including the DLC too), on the graphics side it's one of the most beautiful games of the PS4 (beaten by TLOU2 and RDR2).In my opinion Horizon Zero Dawn is a mixture between Tomb Raider (3rd person view, gameplay mechanics, craft), FarCry Primal (atmosphere), The Witcher 3 (3rd person view, atmosphere, RPG mechanics), and some Assassins Creed (3rd person view, climbing).The story takes place in the 31st century and follows Aloy. The world is dominated by robotics creatures : the "machines", humans on the other sides try to survive in different small groups.Aloy is a hunter trying to discover what happen to mankind, especially why the machines are becoming more aggressive over the years and on the other side why humans have such limited access to technology.Gameplay is where this game is really good, the battles against the machines are a lot of fun and got a lot of possibilities (especially the big one like the Thunderjaw or Stormbird), combats with humans are on the other side really poor.The games has no vehicle except that Aloy can ride some machines like a horse (yay).The game has a lot of collectibles, but there are not required to progress in the story.OST and sounds are also great.The game consumes a lot GPU power, Ryzen 3700X + 32Gb RAM + GTX1080 here and I got like 45fps average with the high settings on a 21/9 screen at 3440*1440.For the moment it also got a lot of stuttering, and it crash randomly (I bet a patch we'll be released soon).You can expect to gain some FPS if you tweak some useless options (wait for a full guide like RDR2 got), or to the devs to increase the performance.https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2190247414At 50€ if you are looking for this game since it was released on the PS4 or if you want a great story/gameplay/graphics then it's worth it. If not, then wait for a discount.Overall this game is my TOP5 PS4 exclusive games, among God Of War, TLOU2, Ghost of Tsushima, and Days Gone, maybe one day we'll get these on Steam.TL, DR:---{Graphics}---☐ You forget what reality is☑ Beautiful☐ Good☐ Decent☐ Bad☐ Don‘t look too long at it☐ MS-DOS---{Gameplay}---☑ Very good☐ Good☐ It‘s just gameplay☐ Mehh☐ Watch paint dry instead☐ Just don't---{Audio}---☐ Eargasm☑ Very good☐ Good☐ Not too bad☐ Bad☐ I'm now deaf---{Audience}---☐ Kids☐ Teens☐ Adults☑ All (no blood, no executions in the game)---{PC Requirements}---☐ Check if you can run paint☐ Potato☐ Decent☐ Fast☑ Rich boi (If you except to play at 1440p, hope you got at least a 2070/5700)☐ Ask NASA if they have a spare computer---{Difficulity}---☐ Just press 'W'☐ Easy☑ Significant brain usage☐ Easy to learn / Hard to master☐ Difficult☐ Dark Souls---{Grind}---☐ Nothing to grind☐ Only if u care about leaderboards/ranks☐ Isnt necessary to progress☑ Average grind level☐ Too much grind☐ You‘ll need a second live for grinding---{Story}---☐ No Story☐ Some lore☐ Average☐ Good☑ Lovely☐ It‘ll replace your life---{Game Time}---☐ Long enough for a cup of coffee☐ Short☑ Average☐ Long☐ To infinity and beyond---{Price}---☐ It’s free!☑ Worth the price☐ If u have some spare money left☐ Not recommended☐ You could also just burn your money---{Bugs}--- (will be edited when patched)☐ Never heard of☐ Minor bugs☑ Can get annoying☐ ARK: Survival Evolved☐ The game itself is a big terrarium for bugs

1er épisode excellent comme le premier Life Is Strange.La DA est toujours aussi belle, graphiquement c'est casi pareil que le premier (pourtant le moteur du jeu est passé de l'UE3 à Unity), gros + pour les cheveux qui resemblent enfin à des cheveux, pareil au niveau de la synchronisation des visages.L'OST est vraiment sublime et réflète très bien l'esprit de Chloé de mon point de vue.L'histoire perd le pouvoir de Max mais gagne un mode 'saccage' de Chloé où le joueur peut confronter un perso selon une sorte de mini-jeu.Niveau mini-jeu aussi, j'ai adoré la partie de RPG avec Steph, vraiment excellent.Niveau histoire je ne spoil pas, mais j'ai trouvé Before The Storm plus léger, aussi cool que le jeu d'origine, vu qu'on ne peut plus 'rewind' il faut bien réfléchir aux choix à faire.Si vous avez aimé le premier Life Is Strange, vous aimerez Before The Storm sans aucun doute.De toute façon je suppose que vous l'avez précommandé comme moi si vous avez surkiffé Chloé <3

Just Cause 3Comme je viens de finir le jeu à 100%, je vous propose une review pour ceux qui serait tentés. J'ai eu le jeu gratuitement avec l'achat d'un CPU Intel, mais j'avais déjà joué à Just Cause 1 et 2 pour info.La version PCCommencement par le plus utile (et aussi le plus pathétique) : l'optimisation du titre est absolument ATROCE.Déjà si votre PC n'a pas plus de 8go de RAM n'achetez pas ce jeu si vous visez l'ultra. (Les développeurs l'ont confirmé le jeu dépasse la conso des 8go annoncés sur la fiche de steam, le seul moyen d'arriver à faire fonctionner correctement le bousin est d'avoir 16go sinon bonjour le stuterring à gogo).Passer ce détail le jeu est très gourmand pour un rendu loin d'être photoréaliste mais plutôt joli dans l'ensemble avec des paysages très sympas pour les fans de screenshots.En ultra/1080p avec une config à base de 4790K + 290X + 16go de RAM : j'obtiens en moyenne 80-90FPS avec des chutes à 50 quand il pleut ou qu'il y a beaucoup d'explosions. L'utilisation du i7 est de l'ordre de 60%, la RAM est dans les 11go utilisé (oui vous avez bien lu, sans aucun autre programme lancé :D).Autre info intéressante que j'ai remarqué récemment : le jeu déteste être lancé avec un pad de 360 branché au lancement.  En faisant çà le jeu à d'énormes fuites de mémoire et la conso de RAM monte jusqu'à 100% puis crash (même en ayant un SWAP de 40go sur SSD). Seul moyen de contourner le problème : brancher sa manette une fois le jeu chargé complètement.Le soloL'histoire du jeu même si elle est extrêmement vu et revu est plutôt sympa : Rico (le gentil) vient en aide à son peuple contre le méchant dictateur local DiRavello qui sévit sur l'ile. Tel un sauveur Rico va devoir libérer l'ile au fur et à mesure et vaincre le méchant dictateur. Outre les missions principales, Just Cause 3 propose une flopée d'avant-postes et de villes à libéré ainsi que des missions aléatoires et une grosse quantité de collectibles et défi (courses terrestres/avions/bateau, wingsuit, détruire une base avec tel arme en faisant le meilleur score etc...).Le jeu propose un système de progression où l'on peut améliorer son équipement. Le problème que j'ai trouvé est que si vous voulez dès le début du jeu réussir à faire les meilleurs scores pour débloquer le plus de mécanismes (le système de points du jeu) vous devez avoir les meilleures voitures/bateaux/armes qui sont accessibles uniquement à la fin :/Du coup j'ai fini l'histoire avant de m'attaquer aux défis.Le jeu dispose d'un nombre conséquent de véhicules : voitures, motos, bateaux, hélicoptères, avions... La physique des véhicules terrestres est très rigide et absolument immonde en hors-piste : hors de question d'arriver à gérer les bosses d'une route de campagne en allant trop vite. Les hélicos et les avions sont cependant très simple à prendre en main tout comme la wingsuit de Rico.Durée de vieJust Cause étant un open-world, la durée de vie est typique de ce genre de jeu : l'histoire prend environ 10-12h à être fini auquel on ajoute environ 5h de collectibles à récupérer, 5h de plus pour récupérer tous les véhicules (dont certains sont bien cachés et difficiles à récupérer) et 10-15h de défis. Au final le jeu souffre du même problème que Mad Max (du même studio) : un solo sympa mais trop de quêtes Fedex qui deviennent lassantes et répétitives.Point intéressant, le système de largage de véhicules qui rend possible le spawn à des lieux qui étaient réservés à des trainers auparavant : qui ne rêve pas de descendre du plus haut point de l'ile à moto ?Bande sonJust Cause 3 à une VF qui est trop caricaturée au niveau des personnages de mon point de vue. Vous risquez de bien rigoler en entendant certaines répliques totalement WTF et l'accent de certains persos. Les musiques sont cependant très sympa et en phase avec l'environnement.On ne le répétera jamais assez : si vous n'avez pas la config recommandée passer votre chemin sous peine de le regretter, personnellement avec une config plutôt musclée je me suis bien amusé sur Just Cause 3 c'est pourquoi je le note en positif.Points +- L'ile est immense- Très fun à jouer- Un bon défouloir, ça pête de partout !- De jolis paysages- Le système de spawn de véhicules/armes- Un choix important de véhicules et armes (petite pensée au RPG au bavarium :D)Points -- L'optimisation totalement honteuse pour un jeu en 2015-2016.- Conso de RAM énorme- Rendu trop "simple" pour la consommation du jeu- Jeu trop répétif à terminer à 100%- La mentalité du studio qui préfère préparer les DLC au lieu de fixer ce foutu jeuNOTE GLOBAL - 6.5/10 // Un jeu avec un potentiel énorme gaché par une optimisation digne d'un Assasin's Creed Unity et dont le studio se fout royalement.Histoire - 6/10Gameplay - 9/10Graphismes - 7/10Physique - 4/10Audio - 7/10I.A. - 5/10
- Take the Supra Time Attack for a ride.- Put the turbo at 100%- Pshiiiiiiitttttttttttttttt10/10

Un concept intéressant entaché par beaucoup de points noirsAyant fait tous les Call Of Duty depuis leur création en 2003, j'ai longtemps hésité (et attendu de payer au final celui-ci 25€) car le côté futuriste ne m'a jamais enchanté. Je me considèrerai comme un vieux de la vielle, qui maintient que Call Of Duty doit rester une série faisant appel à des conflits militaires et non à un espèce de mix futuriste entre Titanfall, Crysis et Destiny.Le soloTout d'abord commençons par le commencement, le solo qui sans être exceptionnel à le mérite d'exister. La grosse annonce d'Activision fut sans aucun doute la présence de l'acteur Kevin Spacey qui joue un des principaux protagonistes. L'ensemble est plutôt classique (cette fois-ci on saute l'habituel USA VS Russie pour se concentrer sur le monde VS une boîte privée). L'histoire est très linéaire, et contrairement aux autres Call Of Duty est TROP bourrine, dans la dizaine de missions proposées il n'y a pas une seule qui requiert de l'infiltration à la manière de Modern Warfare sur la mission se déroulant à Pripiat.Le très gros problème du solo est justement causé par cette impression. Plus on avance dans l'histoire, plus celle de Modern Warfare 2 se répète; à savoir le gentil allié qui se retrouve enfaite être le pire salopard, coucou Général Shepard !Enfin je noterais que le solo est proposé à la manière d'un film Hollywoodien, SAUF que la fin n'est pas du tout en corrélation et manque tellement de théâtralité qui est la recette majeure d'un Call Of Duty (oui vous savez les trucs improbables qui n'arrivent que dans Call Of Duty).Le multilParlons maintenant de l'aspect essentiel d'un Call Of Duty (depuis Modern Warfare) : le multijoueur (parce que oui, jusqu'à COD 3 le solo était la pièce maîtresse). Activision a vendu son jeu comme plus fun, plus nerveux avec son gameplay futuriste, sauf qu'au final c'est tout le contraire. Au début on se sent un peu déboussolé, et le titre demande un temps d'adaptation pour le maitriser.Les modes de jeux restent classiques (avec les traditionnelles TDM/Domination mais également des nouveaux modes plutôt sympa comme liaison satellite/avantage), sauf que les maps ne se prêtent pas toute bien à ces nouveaux modes. Le système de customisation est plutôt bien pensé, et le jeu propose un ensemble plutôt conséquent d'armes et accessoires. Sauf qu'on aimerait bien moins de truc qui ruine l'expérience de jeu comme les lance-grenades ou autres détecteurs de visée.Le problèmeVous devez-vous dire je fais finalement l'apologie de ce Call Of Duty et pourtant je le note sévèrement, et bien en réalité tout n'est pas rose. Tout d'abord ce jeu souffre d'un très vieux problème : pas de serveurs dédiés. Ce qui fait qu'on se retrouve pénalisé par un système hybride de P2P qui par moments offre de magnifiques décalages entre ce qu'on prend dans la tronche et ce qu'on voit dans la killcam. Avec l'argent que génère cette série on peut se demander pourquoi depuis le temps ce n'est toujours pas réglé et on pourra remercier au passage Activision de sa politique des prix et le fait de vendre des DLC remplis de skins tous plus useless les uns que les autres. D'ailleurs on en rajoutera une couche avec le zombie qui se retrouve payant comme par magie.Ensuite le moteur graphique est toujours aussi primitif. Eh oui, les saccades, freezes et stuttering sont de la partie. De plus le jeu supporte très mal le multi-GPU (SLI ou CrossFire), ce qui a pour effet de rallonger les temps de chargements des maps et provoque de nombreux micros-lags extrêmement chiants. L'autre incohérence vient du fait d'avoir bridé le multijoueur à 91FPS, ce qui fait que les possesseurs d'écran 120/144hz (ou CRT si vous êtes nostalgique^^) peuvent aller se coucher. Pourtant le jeu a été vendu comme un Battlefield-killer (au niveau graphique) et pourtant même en Ultra le jeu reste très moyen avec un aliasing très prononcé. Je ne parle pas non plus de l'optimisation du moteur physique qui arrive à pousser un i5 4670K@4.4Ghz à 100% de charges pendant les chargements.Certains se demandent aussi pourquoi des mecs gueulent à cause d'aimbot ? Simple : prendre une manette et activer la visée automatique qui fait tout le travail pour vous.La communauté en jeu est déplorable, le jeu se voulait fun et nerveux et bien c'est tout le contraire. Les équipiers ne connaissent généralement pas le mot objectif mais plutôt celui de camping (les tentes c'est chez Decathlon plutôt). Les spawns sont également très foireux, combien de fois me suis-je retrouvé à spawner à 2 mètres d'un type.Enfin je terminerais par l'équilibrage des armes du multijoueur qui est catastrophique, les armes lasers (l'EM1 en tête) sont tellement puissants qu'ils rivalisent avec quasiment tout (du pistolet au fusil de précision) et ne parlons pas de l'ASM1 avec laquelle j'arrive à défoncer des snipers à plus de 100 mètres.Ah et j'oubliais : le jeu ne supporte pas le Eyefinity/Surround et peut-être pas non plus le 21/9 nativement, donc si vous voulez jouer sur 3 écrans ou plus (ce qui est mon cas) vous devez passer par un logiciel alternatif qui fait correctement la mise à l'échelle (ceux qui sont intéressés : Widescreen Fixer) - un comble pour un jeu AAA comme celui-ci.LES PLUS- Un concept original.- Un gameplay plutôt sympa mais qui requiert un petit temps d'adaptation.- Le solo qui a le mérite d'exister.- Le multijoueur qui est assez fun à jouer.LES MOINS- Le moteur graphique historique.- L'optimisation à revoir totalement : lags, freezes et crashs et consommation de RAM énorme pour les faibles qualités du titre.- Le multi-GPU très mal gérer.- L'ATH qui bug et l'image compressée en Eyefinity/Surround.- L'histoire du solo trop téléphoné, trop prévisible.- La limite de 91FPS en multi, on se demande pourquoi ?- Les connections, je te met 2 balles et le coup d'après tout le chargeur y passe sans aucun dégâts.- Aucun équilibrage en multi, 3 ou 4 armes au-dessus de tout le reste.- La communauté : remplis de rageux, haineux...- Les spawns foireux qui pourrissent le gameplay.- La politique d'Activision qui se résume à : pognon, pigeon, pognon, pigeon...NOTE GLOBAL - 4/10 // Call Of Duty Advanced Warfare est un concept intéressant entaché par sa technicité et sa communauté préhistoriqueHistoire - 4/10Gameplay - 7/10Graphismes - 5.5/10Physique - 3/10Audio - 5/10I.A. - 3/10

今から始めても一方的にボコボコにされるだけのゲームとてもじゃないけど経験者以外の方にはオススメできません要求する知識と技術が多い上に残ってるプレイヤーは経験を積んだ上級者のみ練習しようにもCPUは人間とは欠け離れた動きをするしオンラインに行けば格上相手に延々一方的にやられてオシマイこんな状態なので勿論オンラインに初心者なんてほぼ居ません。絶滅危惧種です上達して対等な相手を見つけられるようになればのめり込めるゲームなのですがその上達するまで継続出来る状態じゃないのがこのゲームです。上達するまでに殆どの人が現存のプレイヤーに叩き落とされるイメージ一緒に対戦してくれる人がいるか相当我慢強い人じゃなきゃ続けられないと思うので買う前に色々考えたほうが良いと思います。※今現在フリープレイの影響で人口が普段の約4倍になっていますフリープレイ終了後が少し怖いですが始めるタイミング的には最高の状態なのでぜひ

発売してから3ヶ月しか経ってないのに人が居なくてまともにゲームがプレイできない時間帯を気にしてやっとTDMのみがプレイ出来るような状況です。ゲームバランスはCS版重視だと言われれば納得できるバランス。勿論良い所もあります、がマッチングしてプレイ出来なきゃ意味がありません。発売3ヶ月でこの人口なのでセールなどで人口が爆発的に増えることもまず無いでしょう。マルチプレイメインで買うならオススメはとてもじゃないけど出来ません。シングルモードに関して言えば完成度高かったですシングルモードメインで買っても後悔しないと思います。日本特別割増価格、8208円の価値があるかと聞かれたら困りますがね...

日本語どころか日本からの購入権も抜き取られました。（おま国化）まさかの対応も超次元。日本語は音声にだけ対応。他、英語のみ。既にある日本語テキストをわざわざ抜いたのが残念です。それ以外はPC版として概ね満足しています。まずゲーム自体は本当に普通。特別面白いわけではないけどつまらないわけでもない。そこにキャラクターやらネタが入って面白く感じるゲームだと思います。テキストは英語のみですがほとんど問題ありません日本語音声で大事なとこは殆ど読んでくれます。アイテムの説明などは勿論英語のみなので注意が必要ですが。まあ、可愛いキャラクターの胸が揺れたりするんでそういうのが好きな人が買うゲームだと思いました。
日本語を抜く同人ゲームも多い中、日本語完全サポート尚且つ実績対応で全実績解除は簡単トレーディングカードは遅れて対応するらしいです。Steam版は全年齢対象版です。隠されたのが見たくなる人は18禁版を買ったらいいと思います最後にSteam版でも揺れます
別にグラは綺麗でもないのに要求スペックが高いマルチに関しては移動は遅いし体力少ないし明らかにPCでやるには不向きその前にそもそもオンラインに人が居ない。ストーリーはそれなりに楽しめたが実績を気にしながらプレイしても６時間でクリアできるほどボリューム不足で最後は続編作る気満々のスッキリしない終わり方。これやるなら無料FPSでもやったほうが良いと思います。ほんといまさらですけど

Her ne kadar Total War serisinde çağından ötürü Medieval’lar benim favorim olsa da Rome’un da güzelliğini hiç bir şekilde reddedemem elbette. Üstelik artık yeni nesil Total War oyunun en üst düzey bireyi olan Rome 2 bizlere pek çok yenilikle geliyor.Empire ile adeta farklı döneme geçen Total War serisinde Shogun 2 teknik açıdan tam bir dönüm noktası olarak görülebilir ancak Shogun çok kapalı bir kültür ve temadan oluştuğu için hayran kitlesi diğer TW oyunlarına nazaran daha azdı o yüzden belki de yeterli ilgiyi alamadı. Creative Assembly’e de konu hakkındaki ilk sorum “Neden bu yeni hali için ilk önce Shogun’u seçtiniz?” olmuştu. Yapımcılar ise bize Shogun’un hem coğrafi hem de kültürel açıdan daha sınırılı ve kolay olduğunu belirtip “Kendimizi bunun üzerinde deneyerek Rome 2 için en iyinin ne olacağına ve nasıl olacağına karar verdik” demişlerdi. Oyunu gördükten sonra siz de fark edeceksiniz ki bu oldukça doğru bir karar olmuş.Total War hayranı olup da Shogun 2’yi çok sevmeyen ya da kısa zamanda sıkılanlar açıkçası meraklanmasın nitekim Rome 2 ile Shogun 2 arasında bir hayli fark var.
Kanser etmesine rağmen devam ettiren bir oyun ..

You know how some games are so sophisticated that you have to play it more than once to truly capture it's essence?  This is definitely NOT one of them. "Thoughts Are Meant To Be Free"  DISCLAIMER - As of the time i am writing this review, i only played through one ending. As soon as i finished the game, i had the urge to write this review, the urge to share with the world how amazingly complex and mind-boggling this game is.Orwell in a way reminded me of  Papers, Please  (Which you can find my review of it  HERE ).In Orwell you will be The Big Brother. You will snoop into people's lives and find some and some less sensitive information about said people.Orwell Does not contain much gameplay, Yet it succeeds to be an amazing piece of art, Solely with it's story.Do i recommend Orwell? Absolutely.It's amazing. It's unique.  It's not for everyone. I won't recommend it though, for people who get bored easily, and look for gameplay and graphics rather than story. EDIT : So now that i managed to do all endings and basically turn the game inside out for the achievements, it's safe to say this game is a 10/10. Every single conflict you'll encounter will guarantee to have an impact on the way the story goes, making you really question which one to add to the database.There are numerous endings, each one has it's own consequences and effects on The Nation (Where the game takes place).As said earlier, get it only if you're a nut for a good, solid storyline. Otherwise, don't bother with it.

Papers, Please is a unique game that has done something only few games have done. it will test your moral compass as close to the limits as possible, it'll test your humanity, trouble solving ability and quick time reactions. Papers, Please also manages to take something that at first glance would seem a boring task, playing as  an immigration inspector in a border checkpoint, to a work of art.That's a solid 10/10. A must with or without a sale.

Let me start this review with the fact that this game is not like anything you have ever played.It does not involve shooting, car chases or any type of sports. instead,  it tells a story. I won't include any actual info about the story since it's the only thing this game has to offer. it might sound like not enough, but once you'll play this game start to finish, you'll understand what i'm talking about.The game maybe be a bit short, but it really does not need any more time to prove itself.it's just so deep and sophisticated, you will ponder it's meaning for days after you finished it.If you have time, spare cash or just looking to diverse a bit, i definitely recommend this short  game   experience..

"The Wolf Among Us" is a five episode series based on Fables (DC Comics/Vertigo), an award-winning comic book series by Bill Willingham. it is a violent, hard-boiled thriller where the characters and creatures of myth, lore and legend are real, and exist in our world. Your choices matter and will change and define the story you experience. Purchase "The Wolf Among Us":http://store.steampowered.com/app/250320/═══════════════════════════════════When it comes to quality story gameplay, you can't go wrong with Telltale Games. and "The Wolf Among Us" is no surprise to be one of the best story driven games on the market.The game takes place in Fabletown, New York, after all the fairy tales' characters had escaped the woodlands to live a modern life, leaving everything behind. You play as Sheriff Wolf Bigby, who was in the past the Big Bad Wolf from the Little Red Riding Hood story. Throughout the story you'll investigate the story of the Murder of two Prostitues -  Holly the troll and Faith (A.K.A Donkeyskin). Atmosphere The game's atmosphere is amazing. there's always this noir feeling to it and you just want to keep playing for "just 10 more minutes".StoryThe game sucks you into it's amazing atmosphere and story. It'll question your moralities and decision making abillities. You will have the option to play as the vicious bad cop, or be kind (each is satisfying on its own). You will get emotional.Whether it's the brilliant voice acting, the absolutely AMAZING writing or the fantastic story, this game is not one you will forget after you're done playing it. Graphics Simple, yet sophisticated. Cartoon-ish, which fits the game perfectly since the game's about fairy tales and stories.Not many graphic options, but it doesn't really matter in this game, where the main focus is on the story telling abillity. Final Score - 10/10This game left an impact on me. the kind of impact that, once you finished the game, you know there isn't any game like that, and you wish you could play it for the first time again. i hope Telltale will give us a  2nd season of this marvelous game. Buy it now!

"I'm not crazy... I'm just mad"═══════════════════════════════════Mad Max, the critically acclaimed movie franchise, now has it's very own video game, and it's a really good one too!Mad Max is a post-apocalyptic action-adventure game, with a heavy emphasis on vehicular combat, in which the player takes on the role of eponymous character Mad Maxhttp://store.steampowered.com/app/234140/═══════════════════════════════════Short SummaryNow, when you first think about Movie-Based video games, they're often not that good (Rambo for instance. good god that was a trainwreck). But Mad Max is nothing like that. Mad Max is an absolute gorgeous game, let alone it's optimazation is great aswell, the combat is extremly fun and the driving's fun and action packed. So witout further ado, let's review this bad boy!Pros: Story is great, immersive and really lurs you in, as Max is on his journey to find his beloved car and to find some solace.The charachters are really in depth, and has their own stories and journeys.Cutscenes are well made The game's gorgeous, one of the best Wastelands i've seen in a videogame. This game is like a mashup between Fallout (Exploring locations and scavenging for supplies) and Sleeping Dogs (Same combat system, and there's an emphasis on car-to-car vehicular combat.) Lots of customisation available, starting from Max's armor and jacket, to his haircut and facial hair. there's also an incredible range customisations available for the Magnum Opus, max's signature car along the game. Great SFX and voice acting, really gives that atmospheric feeling to it. You won't run out of thing to do! there's  alot  of activities and side quests to do. Combat system is really simple and great. Well made upgrade system. you can shoot ROCKETS FROM YOUR CAR!Cons: What would seem like a big surprise for a game that is so focused about driving and cars, there's no handbrake!The ending is really anticlimatic and short, and it just sums the whole fantastic story really badly (in my opinion of course). glitches oftenly occure, although most of them are minor and not that big of a deal.So, the final rating i give for Mad Max is -  9/10 For me, Mad Max is one of the best, funnest games i've played and is on my Top 5 Games of 2015.Heavily recommended, especially when it goes on sale for  20$ .

Agent 47 is at it again!═══════════════════════════════════ Hitman: Absolution™  is the fifth installment to the Hitman franchise, starring the legend himself, Agent 47.http://store.steampowered.com/app/203140/═══════════════════════════════════So here are the Pros and Cons for Hitman: Absolution™ Pros: Great Voice Acting Beautiful Graphics Doing Challenges is rewarding and challenging Online leaderboards to compete with your friends and become the best assassin of them all!Enviromental Kills are cool and sometimes hilarious  Contracts mode let's you create your own unique levels and publish them for others to enjoy and rate Replay Value Cons:  Gun customization is only enabled in contracts mode and not in the single player campaign which is absolutely ridiculous. The storyline has really nothing to do with the essence of Agent 47 or his personal traits. he suddenly grows emotions, like empathy which you would not expect from a cold hearted killer like 47. The game itself is linear and just feels like "Alright, go from this point, kill some bad guys, go to this place aaaand cutscene". In Conclusion Hitman: Absolution™ is a good game. not a great game, but certainly not a bad one either. it's a fresh breath of air to the series, mainly because it's completely different than the previous games - which is both a blessing and a curse. I give  Hitman: Absolution™ : 7.5/10  For more recommendations and reviews on our favourite up and coming quality games follow Lot's O Giveaway's group curations here

This is one of the most tragic, touching, beautiful and story rich games you can ever play.We are not talking about COD and Battlefield conveyor, this is a real masterpiece.Pros:- visually beautiful style;- unique gameplay;- non linear and butterfly effect rich game;- soundtrack is well fitting;- story is deep and touching AF;- interesting achievements;Cons:- depression after touching story T_T;- kinda short...It isnt I just wanted more;- some people inevitably die T_T;Overall:This is a must have game, dont even hesitate to buy it during sales!

Before you buy the game please check this review and youtube videos to clarify what this game is.First of all, I wanted to say that I am absolutely in love with this game and recommending it.It has everything I want from the games: amazing soundtracks, difficult choices to be made, great looking visual effects/graphics and a lore to be explored.Short prehistory: Mother (player) is leading her army (daughters) against evil forces (The others) which trying to torture and then destroy the world.There are 5 main things you need to know about this game:1. you will fall and will be destroyed just to rise again even stronger;2. you will be forced to make hard choices such as sacrificing your daughters for the greater good;3. timeline and your position on the battlefield are the keys to victory;4. game will punish you for every mistake you made;5. there is autosave only1. you will fall and will be destroyed just to rise again even stronger;Yes, that is correct. The game wants you to fail just to follow the path of the phoenix such as "you give everything you have got, you die and you become even stronger after rebirth". This rebirth can be activated manually (next recollection) or automatically when all of your daughters were killed (same recollection mechanic).The next recollection will reset everything you have achieved except remembrances bonuses (for example, +15% of health for all daughters), special currency for buying remembrances and 3 strongest of your alive daughters. Also, last 32 dead daughters will be saved in resurrect chamber to be revived for special in game coins.2. you will be forced to make hard choices such as sacrificing your daughters for the greater good;This is the main idea of the game: you have to sacrifice daughters to win a battle and this war. This sacrifice can be made by:- holding the enemies to let other daughters and/or bright soul escape- sacrificing daughter to heal another daughter (there are no other way to heal daughters in nightmare mode)By doing the sacrifice you are not just healing daughter but also give her part of her sister power called traits (for example +532 HP and +1% of evasion). So as mentioned in item #1 by each loss you become stronger.3. timeline and your position on the battlefield are the keys to victory;The timeline in this game is dynamic and each move/attack/ability might change the order of turns and possible outcome of the fight. Your daughters are always outnumbered (sometimes 4 or 5 times) and sometimes outgunned (enemies are stronger) on the battlefield. This are your main disadvantages. In order to defeat your enemies you should:- keep your daughters united and enemies separated to face it one by one or wave by wave (use terrain features and timeline management);- analyze each your move and keep an eye on enemy attack range;- remember that each hit your daughters take will move you closer to a hard choice of sacrifice.4. game will punish you for every mistake you made;As mentioned in previous items, each action has a consequence; each hit will move you closer to a needed sacrifice; each death of your daughters will lower your army number. So keep that in mind when you play this game of thrones scenario;5. there is autosave onlyAction has consequences and you cannot escape it by shutting down game and reloading last save. Every move you make, every action you do will be registered for the only one goal: to face the outcome of your choices.

Aspect Rating   Gameplay 9/10   Story 2/10   Graphics 9/10   Sound 6/10   Optimization 6/10   Overall 6/10👍 Pros: 👍 Soulcalibur game for PC is a pros for itself; Beautiful stages and highly detailed fighters; Ability to customize base characters (from colour to new outfits); New gamemode called Libra of Souls; Guest heroes upcomming.👎 Cons: 👎 Amount of fighters is pretty low; Customization options are not enough; Story of characters and canonical issues; Soundtracks are not catchy.Now lets discuss those cons: Amount of fighters is pretty low;If you are a fan of Soulcalibur III, IV and V you will be very dissapointed. There are no memorable characters like Amy, Cassandra, Setsuka, Hong Yun-seong and some others. Customization options are not enough;There are literraly 10 options in each section. Moreover, some of those are locked and you have to buy it with ingame currency. As a fan of Soulcalibur games I can affirm that this is the worst Soulcalibur customization menu ever! Story of characters and canonical issues;Lets be honest this is an AAA game for 60$. For that price you expect something good, right? Well there is a problem with that. First of all, there are no cutscenes. All you can see is changing from time to time pictures with avatars of heroes. Voice acting for some characters is awful (I am speaking of eng localization). In addition to that, sometime characters are showing wrong expressions (like in Groh story then his friend Curtis is screaming but avatar is smiling Oo).But the most strange thing is that nightmare is now an evil version of Siegfried! WTF Namco?! He is supposed to be his father but no we are supposed to impress auditory of our game...Lets make something veeeeery strange, right Namco?Final rating and recommendation for/against buying game:Final rating: Game is beautiful and colourful but with those cons I can conclude that at this current build of the game I am very dissapointed.Recommendation for/against buying game: I cannot recommend this game to be bought (even If I wanted to). My suggestion is to wait 3-4 months to see if the situation was changed and hen reconsider that.

- First impressions:finally, RDR2 without boring single player, and for only 4.5 buckswait.. stop. 120 GB for DETACHED ONLINE? WHAT?- Main review:- The technical side of the game:So, I played a little and can supplement my review. I can tell right away that I am impressed with the download speed online, it is much faster than in GTA5. And also, I was not thrown out ten times when trying to connect, did the rockstar do a tremendous job and fix their sh*tty servers?UPD. A few days later I found out that they hadn't fixed the servers. To go online I have to use vpn. THANKS.There are big problems with the sound, nothing is heard at all. And there is no way to fix it.UPD. The sound must be adjusted in the Windows mixer.You can go to the settings only after creating a character and viewing the intro. But I want to do it right away!- A little about the pc version:Since I came here from the console version of the game. I will also give my opinion about the PC version itself, and not just online.Finally i can play with unlocked frame rate.Vast selection of graphical options for fine tuning your desired experience.Increased draw distance.Overall improved textures.HDR support and up to 3840 x 2160 resolution support.Ultra wide and multi-monitor setup support.- Content:Grind, grind, grind.Monetizing Red Dead Online has become even more aggressive. For example, for completing a Battle Pass worth 40 gold bars, you can only get 30 bars - that is, you have to donate again to buy the next season pass.In modern service games like Apex Legends, Call of Duty, and Fortnite, players not only return all investments, but also increase them when fully completing the Premium Pass branch. For example, a Call of Duty subscription costs 1000 coins, and you can get 1400 coins for completing a season.In addition, starting today in Red Dead Online, the reward multiplier for completing Daily Challenges resets at 28 days, after which you have to start all over again. At the same time, prices for premium projects are gradually increasing.- Conclusion:I think this can be done. Rockstars are just trying to siphon all the money from their players without offering anything in return. 4 bucks game, of course, is worth it. For a couple of weeks here you can have fun with friends, and then abandon the game. After all, you did not give the full price, so it's not a pity.

You can consider me quite impressionable, but for me personally this game was so deeply remembered and caused a storm of emotions after passing (I mean the final scenes) that I was a little taken aback and did not start another game for 2 more days after completion, digesting the plot and events unfolding in it ... and also wanted to go through another - a bad ending, which I will soon do.Developers so professionally instill in the player an affection for (open and prescribed) characters that you can unwittingly listen to their conversations, which can sometimes last for 4-5 minutes !! (and I haven’t met this yet) and empathize, worry or support them in monologues (yes, Artyom’s voice has not yet been delivered, Gordon Freeman sends his regards).The developed and almost open world in some large locations is very impressive, accessible to the player to research, search for loot and improve equipment and weapons, random encounters and search for notes and tapes for understanding the plot as a whole, etc.It used to be fun to watch comparisons between STALKER and METRO.I always understood that the first is huge open locations, open lands and so on, and the second is linear corridors and tunnels and that it’s simply impossible to compare these games ...But with the release of Exodus, you realize that here is as spiritually Stalkera as possible. But not about that.+ I liked the customization of the weapon and its presentation itself. The body kit of trunks and the improvement of Artyom’s suit are elegantly presented and woven into the mechanics; almost all of them are clearly worth the time spent searching for them.+ Gorgeous traced locations. Very atmospheric. Winter on the Volga River, the dried Caspian Sea with rotting hulls of ships and shacks, rotting their age, autumn Taiga with beautiful forests and rivers and the Dead, abandoned winter city, which only drives you almost depresnyak, from its doom, "grayness" and hopelessness+ Excellently expanded bestiardia of monsters.+ Interaction with characters is simply incomparable. The game crashes pretty well into the brain and evokes emotions, I haven’t been so impressed with the history of people who often want to help ... and you do it over and over again.+ Graphics. Everything is on top for me. Weapons, landscapes, and room interiors are well designed: bunkers, abandoned huts, tunnels of abandoned metro, etc.+ I really liked how the navigation is presented in the form of a tablet with a map and current tasks.Compass on hand, Geiger counter, Artyom detection sensor in the dark, etc. All this is very well implemented and the main thing is not meaningless.+ Train Aurora. A wonderful and atmospheric hub for the player to take a break from long explorations of the world and dangerous zones. Get to know the characters better, get high from the interior of the equipped wagons, listen to music and talk on the radio waves of unfamiliar survivors among themselves, smoke a cigarette and have a little thump ...You can still write a lot about the pros of the game, I found a huge number of them, but I just recommend buying this wonderful product to every player.Despite the publisher’s idiotic policy, it wasn’t worth underestimating the ratings of the previous parts in this way - this is primarily stupid and stupid. They gave us a great series and maybe! already regretted the transfer of the game to EGS, but there was no turning back ... In the reviews of previous games, frat is a bad deed, I think.The game deserves the highest praise for me, and I recommend it to everyone for passing.

О Террарии я узнал именно из Майнкрафта, а, точнее, мода к нему по имени Timber. В описании к нему была фраза "Теперь деревья рубятся не по кубикам, а целиком, как в Террарии!"."Что это за Террария такая?" - подумал я, и пошел в гугл.Разумеется, первоначально покупать игру я не планировал, поэтому побыл пиратом и скачал версию, кажется, 1.0.3.Игра с самого начала понравилась мне за простой геймплей, музыку, а так же наличие целей - убийство боссов и получение топового шмота (в том же Майнкрафте целей как таковых нет, копание без причины).После всех тестов, я купил уже эту игру в стиме, так как не зря разработчики работали над ней!На самом деле, уже было столько положительных обзоров на эту игру, что и добавить нечего. Давайте по списку:1) ГГ - настойка персонажа на максимальном (для пиксель-игры) уровне, можно выбрать цвет и форму волос, цвет глаз, цвет одежды и пол (а в зависимости от пола персонаж при получении урона по-разному вскрикивает)2) Музыка - даже в меню все понятно, что игра будет местами спокойной, а местами зубодробительной. Присутствует эффект нагнетания и "сгущения туч". В самой же игре у каждого биома своя музыка, которая точно характеризует местность (будь то лес, пустыня или ад).3) Система крафта - если вам говорят, что гид - бесполезен, можете дать ему по лицу. При игре в тот же майнкрафт всегда был открыт сайт с рецептами, приходилось сворачивать\разворачивать игру, что иногда заканчивалось крашами. Тут же принес гиду любой комок грязи, а он рассказал, что из него и других частей можно сделать. А предметов и рецептов - тысячи их! Ну или около того.4) NPC - живые, дерутся, торгуют, разговаривают, взаимодействуют с окружением. Есть во фразах горожан отсылочки к другим играм.5) Враги - от слизней до ЛунногоЛорда - все могут дать вам по лицу, даже в топовом шмоте. Нельзя ни на минуту расслабиться6) Увеличение сложности - и это не только про хардмод. Например, по лесу можно бегать без брони и с медным кинжалом, кромсая слизней всех мастей. Хочешь спуститься в пещеры? Лучше раздобудь броню, хотя бы медную. Хочешь в порчу\кримзон? Без дальнобойного оружия уже будет тяжеловато, да и удары врагов сильнее. И так далее - в каждом новом биоме тебе будут давать по лицу все сильнее, и это заставит тебя раскачивать своего персонажа до топовых цифр урона, защиты, хп и маны. А при входе в хардмод - повтори все еще раз.7) Эксперт - думаешь, что Лунный Лорд - мальчик для битья? Иди в экспертный режим и повтори весь пункт (6) несколько раз, огребай от слизней при топовом шмоте и тому подобное. Ну а если и тут ты в одиночку запинаешь Лунного Лорда... То повтори все это еще раз (оно реально затягивает).8) События - копаешь ты себе значит руду на шмот, а тут (внезапно) появляется сообщение "Армия гоблинов идет тебя пинать". И ведь приходит и пинает: тебя, нпц, нейтральный мобов. И таких событий несколько. Некоторые даже настолько сложны (нет), что ты сам их вызываешь (и огребаешь) (тоже нет).9) Общая красота мира - мир живой, биомы меняются, кролики прыгают, птицы летают и поют. Милота.10) Контроль разведанных территорий - накопал пещеру, поставил факел - ты всегда увидишь, что происходит в этом закутке, если он находится в пределах экрана.11) Боссы - боссы злые, каждый следующий сильнее предыдущего, но в этом и стимул - победить их всех! Ну и плюшек с них падает нехило.12) Огромные миры - самый большой - 16х4км, исследовать его весь, каждую пещеру, найти каждый сундук - нереально, но к этому можно стремиться.13) Класс ГГ - ты можешь быть кем угодно: палладином, вырубающим тонны нечисти, магом, что испепеляет врагов, лучником, который бьет белке в глаз, стрелком из пулемета, а-ля Рембо, ну или же вождем (Тумба-Юмба) для кучи миньёнов, которые кромсают врагов, пока ты пьешь чай.14) Интерьер - ваш дом - ваша крепость. Помимо ловушек для мобов, можно устроить внутреннее убранство комнат, добавив мебель, поклеив обои и тому подобное. Хотя можно построить коробку из грязи и ок.Есть и минусы:1) Рыбалка - кому вообще она нужна? И достижение на 200 пойманных для Рыбака рыб - это такое себе...2) Каждая игра кончается - побил ты Лунного Лорда в Эксперте, и что дальше? Повторить N раз? Ну нет, лучше создать нового персонажа и новый мир. Ощущение неоконченности сюжета присутствует.

A great sandbox, I haven’t seen so many opportunities anywhere else. Here you can deal with the shooting of bots, to the construction of mechanisms. A bunch of add-ons in the in-game free store. A bunch of mods and models. You can also see and feel the things that other people have done.It should be reminded that in multiplayer a huge number of game modes, from the usual Sandbox, to the most popular - Trouble in Terrorist Town. There is also a bunch of functionality, you can make a car, art.Golden hands are capable of creating animations. There are a lot of them, for Garry's Mod is a fairly simple tool-game.This game will fill you with a sea of ​​madness and fun, I definitely recommend it for purchase if someone else has not bought it.The game will not stop bothering you until the mechanisms and mods are developed for this game, and they most likely will never stop being created ...

Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six® Siege - a game from Ubisoft, will impress with its destructible environment, a variety of operatives, a large selection of customization and beautiful graphics.Pros:+ Good anti-cheat (There are still cheaters, but they all get their well-deserved banana)+ Interesting ENT game / operatives (Tells who, where, how and what, it is very interesting to know about units and operatives from different countries)+ A large selection of operatives (At the moment, more than 30 operatives who have been added to the game for 2 years, and in the future their mark will reach 100 operators.)+ Constant support of the game from developers (Updates / bug fixes every month, new operatives every 3 months, new content almost every week)+ Graphics (It's just something incredible, playing on ultra settings is a pleasure, and most importantly, there are a lot of resources and are not required)+ Team game (It all depends on how well you know how to play in a team)+ High-quality sound (Shooting from a weapon is pleasant, it is felt that each weapon shoots in its own way, and not the same type)+ A lot of cards (They are really well made and balanced, although somewhere not, but the developers “try” to make them playable for everyone)+ Weapons / abilities (Each operative has his own unique weapon and abilities, is it not great, you can choose operatives for any kind of tactics)+ Environment (Here you can do anything, blow up, break, shoot at everything except concrete).

I have been playing counter strike for about 2 years. I have put about 200 hours in CS:GO but only 20 in CS:S. I own CS 1.6 and CS Condition Zero but have not played them. Over the years I have found this game great. It is endless fun with friends and even by yourself. There are endless gamemodes and community items,stickers,maps, and servers. But there are some problems with the game. Here is a list of them....CONSVAC is not banning cheaters like it used to, this is because they have found away around the system so it is common to encounter a hacker in MM.64 tik servers which are not so great when playing against people with 200+ pingMM could do better with who gets put with who and smurfs.Nerfs are either inefficient or pointless (like the tec-9 nerf) or they hurt the game (AWP movement nerf)But at the same time there are a lot of pros about this game...PROSEnjoyment to the end with friends and by yourselfCompetitive games for the person who likes to be speaking and communicating to teammatesOnce you buy the game has no must buy in-game purchasesSkill based gameplay and tactics not run-and-gun (Call of Duty)A game that will last a long long timeOverall this game is a timeless game that will take a while before the game will die. Hopefully it lasts as long as CS:S!

John é um pênis não circuncidado que vive sua vida pacata e normal como a de qualquer pênis por ai, realiza tarefas banais, lava os testículos, se alimenta e trabalha em uma empresa testando dildos em seu orifício retal, nada muito fora do comum.  Dia após dia John se prepara para sua festa de ex-alunos do ensino médio, que esta prestes a chegar, faz de tudo para mudar sua vida repentinamente em busca de aprovação, numa tentativa alucinada para obter bens materiais supérflos, relações vazias, e mudar sua aparência em academias, toda essa desordem cheia de satiras sobre Tinder e Facebook.A narrativa dublada lembra bastante The Stanley Parable, e flui naturalmente, de acordo com suas interações pelo cenário, que diga-se de passagem tem uma física absurda.Cara, jamais pensei que um jogo sobre paus iria levantar questões como valores superficiais, busca por aprovação, e bullying. Jogo simplesmente surpreendente!

Mais um para entusiastas de jogos peculiares do tipo Pony Island, Sorry, James, e Selfie : Sisters of the Amniotic Lens. Um pouco clichê pelo foco na quarta parede, e reproduzir o monólogo do Blade Runner. Apesar de ser bem capitalista, uma experiência legal, façam todos finais. Ahhh, não recomendo para o público vegano.

Um jogo fora da curvaUma das experiências mais gostosas e viciantes que já tive, a sensação é estar jogando DOOM com elementos Hack and slash e aquela progressão deliciosa que todo Rogue Like tem.A princípio a ideia é simples, são 3 Dungeons com 1-5 níveis, sendo o último um boss que pode alternar. Mas não se engane, a simplicidade acaba ai, esta mistureba de gêneros feita pela  Duoyi, deu muito certo! Vou listar alguns fatores:✔️A gama de armas disponíveis é sensacional, 44 até o momento, cada uma com características únicas, e não tem arma ruim ou boa, todas se encaixam de acordo com a build que esta sendo criada no personagem, modos de disparos diferentes, uma enxurrada de atributos aleatórios, sendo que você pode roletar esses atributos e até refinar o dano base. Ahh, quase esquecendo, o visual delas é lindo demais, com muitas animações e efeitos.✔️ Existem 4 personagens, com habilidade primária e secundária, e atributos base diferentes. Ao decorrer das dungeons, upgrades de habilidade são adquiridos através de baús espalhados pelo mapa, esses upgrades são distintos, cada habilidade possui vários seguimentos. Relíquias também são encrontradas, 128 no total, e alteram muito a maneira de se jogar, sem deixar a gameplay na mesmice.✔️As dungeons são geradas de maneira procedural, com 3 níveis de dificuldade. Cada nível com suas recompensas e elementos novos.❗️ O único ponto negativo é o sistema de reconexão, que numa eventual queda, não permite que o jogador volte para a partida, espero que melhorem isso imediatamente.Todos esses elementos misturados entregam um leque infinito de opções, é incrivelmente divertido jogar estudando tantas possibilidades de build, armas, habilidades e maneiras de prosseguir na sua run. Além disso é uma excelente opção para jogar com amigos, muito desafiador já que a quantidade de jogadores reformula o nível de dificuldade, sem perder a graça.Recomendo fortemente, 24$ chega a ser um valor simbólico para um jogo de acesso antecipado que esta praticamente pronto, polido e com muito conteúdo. A empresa acabou de anunciar uma nova atualização com personagem novo, arma nova, uma cacetada de coisas, e totalmente de graça! Gunfire tem personalidade, executa com perfeição a sua proposta, e está com um preço honesto, exemplo pra essas empresinhas full CTRL+V lootbox.

Apenas capture imagens/momentos, observando o impacto que eles causam nos bonequinhos, alterando seus comportamentos e opiniões.Um jogo que apesar de ser lançado em 2016, representa perfeitamente todo o poder de influência midiático da atualidade, cultura do imediatismo, sensacionalismo, padrão de beleza, "ódio do bem" e a formação de opinião precoce das pessoas. Tudo isso por meio de sátiras, e elementos da quarta parede que se comunicam com o jogador.Sem militância alguma, mas parei de usar o Facebook pouco antes do Bolsonaro vencer a eleição, devido a enxurrada de informações de cunho violento e extremista que explodiam na minha tela, mesmo restringindo boa parte das minhas "coisas" nesta plataforma. Particularmente foi uma das melhores coisas que eu fiz, era apenas uma válvula de escape para memes(que perdeu a graça depois que a sua família entra na onda) e até hoje eu não uso mais. Mesmo não absorvendo esse tipo de conteúdo, o simples fato de estar no meio dele, fazia mal pra minha saúde mental. Apenas pra finalizar, sou a favor da liberdade de expressão, mas a partir do momento que ela invade a integridade moral, se torna um problema, ninguém tem o direito de apontar, oprimir ou agredir outra pessoa apenas por pensar diferente, mesmo que esse pensamento seja uma bost4.

Confesso que quando vi este jogo pela primeira vez, joguei por poucos minutos, e rotulei como mais um joguinho retrô, arcade sobre SCORES que não renderia mais que duas horas. Hoje jogando com mais profundidade, tive a prazerosa descoberta que se trata de um rogue-like de personalidade, desafiador e com mais conteúdo do que eu imaginava.Logo no menu percebe-se a grande variedade de modos de jogo, dungeons, desafios, triais, e até um incrível jogo de cartas, inspirado em Triple Triad do Final Fantasy. Esse conteúdo é desbloquado a medida que você supera esses desafios, bem variados por sinal, desde fugir duma dungeon sem arma ou jogar na completa escuridão. E o melhor, tudo de maneira procedural.A sua habilidade é um fator determinante para a progressão do jogo, e claro, sorte no que você coleta aleatóriamente nas runs. Não existe atributos fixos para upar, facilitando as próximas tentativas, e isso torna tudo mais desafiador e satisfatório. Existem 9 personagens, com pequenas diferenças de gameplay, mas que alteram muito a maneira de se jogar.Um ótimo jogo, pixel art nostálgica, trilha sonora com pegada bem clássicos da SEGA, e com um carinhoso easter egg do Super Mario. Não conhecia o trabalho do Caiysware, é um dev muito autêntico, extremamente atencioso com sua comunidade, e atualiza seus jogos com frequência.

Acompanho desde early access em fevereiro de 2018, periodicamente jogo 3/4 partidas pra ver como esta, houve um grande avanço em termos de otimização, porém no geral poucas novidades e mesmo passados 3 anos  ainda sofre dos mesmos problemas... ✔️ Os gráficos são impressionantes, o nível de detalhes dos cenários é absurdo, você percebe que cada local recebeu muita atenção, e isso vale para personagens, monstros e itens. Cada ambiente, tanto interno como externo, possuem traços muito característicos. Existe um "glossário" interessante com a lore das armas, criaturas e locais.✔️ A ambientação é muito acima da média para um jogo competitivo, Crytek fez um trabalho surreal neste aspecto, a imersão é insana, melhor que muito AAA. Ao movimentar-se, cada partícula do mapa emite efeitos sonoros responsivos e interagem com cada movimento. É impressionante observar o personagem esgueirando em meio a vegetação, esbarrando em uma garrafa ou o rangir da madeira ao caminhar.  A sistemática mesclando PVP/PVE também é um dos seus destaques. Mesmo entregando esses fatores com excelência, na minha opinião não sustentam um jogo focado em PVP. Hunt: Showdown se tornou caro, com uma comunidade pequena, principalmente na América do Sul.❌ A maior parte das partidas sofri com ping alto. O sistema de busca desloca quem joga da América do Sul para a região secundária. Ao selecionar apenas SA como região de busca, o resultado é muita demora. Formar grupo com amigos pode ser mais rápido, porém com o grande risco de cair em partidas vazias. Falando nisso, não tem como saber quando se esta sozinho. Você pode estar jogando da forma mais tática possível, numa partida apenas com NPC's. Talvez seja o tal "hardcore" que dizem.❌  O desbalanceamento é evidente, jogadores novatos/experientes nas mesmas partidas, e não estou falando de free for all ou casual, é Matchmaking mesmo. A falta de divisão de rank, talvez seja pela carência de jogadores. Como era de se esperar o novo sistema de pareamento de partidas por nível de habilidade da Att 16/04/21, apenas deixou ainda mais demorado encontrar partidas, e mesmo ativado eventualmente acaba não funcionando.❌ Vejo um potencial gigantesco disperdiçado em relação a PVE/COOP, o mapa permite muitas possibilidades, poderiam investir em modos desafiadores, como defender hordas de monstros buscando abrigos em casas, capturar itens etc. Isso consequentemente fortaleceria a comunidade, conquistando novos jogadores.❌ Ainda que rode melhor que no beta, falta ajustes, como ao iniciar ou sair de uma partida, a tela de loading simplesmente congela todo seu computador por um longo tempo, e nem ALT+TAB salva. Falta sistema de notificação ao encontrar partidas, você é obrigado a vegetar na tela de busca, ou corre o risco de perder o grupo.❌ O estopim para escrever esta análise, foi o que aconteceu recentemente. Tive a infelicidade de ser expulso de partidas pelo anti-cheat três vezes seguidas! Foi somente nesse dia, mas em tempos de banimentos gratuitos, isso é preocupante. O mais engraçado é que o hack come solto. Infelizmente não posso recomendar esse jogo, principalmente pra quem joga SA. Pode ser divertido jogar esporadicamente com amigos, mas a longo prazo, fica visível que esses problemas vão atrapalhar sua jogatina. Um jogo inconsistente, desbalanceado e relativamente caro até o momento. Crytek foi ambiciosa em basicamente duplicar o preço após o lançamento, acredito que isso espantou grande parte de jogadores. Uma pena, esta engatinhando a 3 anos com um jogo que poderia facilmente estar em outro patamar. Espero que melhore e futuramente eu possa refazer essa análise positivamente.

Playing this game is like sinking into a deep ocean full of feelings and sensations. Perhaps confusing at first, but throughout history the messages will highlight important points. Finally, many possibilities for interpretation remain open and I believe that this strengthens the premise of the game, each player will have his own experience and theory. The soundtrack and ambient sounds are incredibly engaging. A very relaxing and beautiful experience.

Elex I это Жигули со мотором, объём на 1.5л.Вот Elex II, тот же Жигули, а движок другой, на 2.0л, со турбиной.Показалось, что мало, поставили два Weber'а.В результате, повторение пройдённого, зато летает и жрёт много бензина чем просто Жигули.Кто не понимает автомобилизмы:Elex II - это на базе Elex I, видоизмененный, как будто римейк (не путать со ремастером), места узнаваемы, но неповторяемы от оригинала.Elex II - графика на уровне оригинала, пусть примерно. Зато способен приземить современный пк к малоиграбельный фпс, выставив всё на максимум, в том числе масштабность.Elex II - там смак, это джетпак, означает, быстро можно путешествовать и устраивать бой, пока летишь.В итоге, "старый" и добрый RPG, которые не делают на сегодня.

Самая попугаистая программа в бенчмарке всей игровой индустрии и железа.Классический прогон на потенцию железа, существовало на заре игровой индустрии...Главный плюс - обновляемая программа без привязки к году, как обычно раньше делали, когда безлимит не у всех.А минус лишь один - порог входа немного высокий для непросвящённых, который придётся слушать что говорят стримеры/блогеры по железу. А сами в 3DMark - играть в попугаи.

Ситуация напоминает так, как было со православной Red Faction со соснольским Red Faction 2. Имею в виду, что у первого весь набор шедевральности и способность извлекать гемплей в удовольствие. А второй лишёны, только коридорный и совсем не тот гемплей, память осталась только.Нет секреток, нет бесконечного арсенала, нет личного save/load, зато модно в начале 201х годов -  QTE да автолечение, а мыло опционально, если не отключить постэффекты.Но вот это графика (без постэффекта), приятная в наше время, примерно на уровне F.E.A.R. За это достаточно.Не могу поставить дизлайк, Дюк может меня обидеть, прочитав мой обзор, залезет на балкон и покажет, что такое дюковские озлобленные яйца!З.Ы. 3DRealms не догадывается, что долгострой Forever можно переделать гемплей как у DN3D? Может им "бред какой-то" или нет... Им видней...З.Ы.Ы. С мощным пк, очень большая проблема с космическим фпс, медленно загружает меню при 1000/2000 фпс и в игре быстрая анимация после 400 фпс. Пришлось ограничивать фпс на уровне драйвера, вот такая алята малята.

Re-VoltGame is old but a classic. But it's also kind of broken, however, still playable. Only issues I had was gamepad configurations and stuck in first place requiring race restart.Main reason I wanted it was for a classic addition to my library for nostalgic reasons and for my Steam Deck. Like I said it's a little broken. Yes, this is playable on Steam Deck just fine on Proton 5.13-6 setting. Otherwise you will get a viewpoint error when launching the game. Controls however don't work out of the box, I used a community layout and has fixed most problems.

Kanjozoku Game レーサーAlright, I'll be honest I was quite intrigued with the game because the Devs used Underground 1 Song on the trailer. Visually it looked pretty good for my tastes.As far as what I have played, I can say the state of the game is playable and can get casual enjoyment out of it. Yes, quite rough for what it is right now, however, the structure is there and believe this game has lot's of potential.Optimization on my main rig, I had no problems with 100% scaling. On my Steam Deck, I have also played this on does run it averagely well, but not butter smooth. I'll have another section for this later.For what the game gives you, several cars, plenty of upgrades. Both Performance and Body Work. Let's not forget Stance and Wraps as well. The game does have a good Eurobeat vibe. You have a Highway course, which unfortunately is one way and no exits. I hope this changes. You can race with other people, though, traffic is not sync with other racers. There's police as well, simply you just outrun them or get busted. This is a challenge at first because you're slow, of course.The game does become more enjoyable the more upgrades you put on. I for sure hope for more of a progression system.For what the game is and price, not too bad. Definitely improvements can be made. I'll be following this for sure for future updates.Steam Deck Verification.Going to assume very few playing this on the Steam Deck as of right now. I figured to give it a try. Performance-wise it's pretty average. At 80% scaling you can get a Solid 60fps experience for the most part. Though, some dips to 52 that are short-drops do happen here and there. Game is playable however. 100% Scaling you go down to 42FPS with the same problem with the 80% scaling. 40Hz lock, it does stay close to 40fps. At times it would do a micro-drop to 38fps.Controls work out of the Community Layout. I have used this game on the Xbox S controller of mine on the Desktop, I had no problems.Biggest problem I am running into however. No Cross-Sync on your progress. You restart from the beginning from a different device. This should be addressed. Personally not a huge deal for me, I'll play this more on my Desktop. However, it would be nice to play it in bed or on the couch for a casual session. So I'm not given an option here. Surely some can relate.Overall I'll rate the experience Playable. Verified once those minor issues are addressed.
Gonna be honest...I just wanted the RJuman emojis and had to background this.

Neon WhiteOkay, I can see why this game is absolute hype.A good Speed-Running game with mix of FPS formula. I had no hype, actually, no idea about this game until now. It's actually pretty good. Soundtrack also slaps.Dialogue is pretty cringe but honestly I think it really makes it comical more than anything, it's nothing too serious. So don't expect much of a story. Gameplay however makes up for it.
A nice refreshing experience from the classics.A true chad game indeed.

The Crew™ 2It's actually an ((alright)) game from Ubisoft. Though, you can still tell it's a Ubisoft game by how lazy and cookie-cutter the map placement is. However, the gameplay is quite fun and relaxing as you put Spotify or any app to play some tunes. This game is not a simulator, nor an arcade-sim. It's pure arcade with silly physics. Lot to explore, fair amount of content, decent amount of vehicle selections and unique choices of driving a plane and a boat. Though, the core aspect of the game shifted to focus on cars more as they were favored compared to the other two. Don't expect much of a story (Which racing games lack anyways) and good dialogue. It's really just cliche social media garbage that can be overlooked.You could compare Forza and The Crew 2. Forza is the obvious winner here. But The Crew 2 is fun and unique in it's own way. The Forza elitists will seethe and disagree when reading this. Get some friends, do races, explore, it's quite an enjoyable experiences.Would this game be worth it full price? Honestly I'd argue no. Yes, I do think the game is fun but the quality of it is really a night and day difference with Forza. There ARE some customization for vehicles, however, not at NFS level. I've personally gotten the Gold version for $30 and pretty satisfied with it. As this being a Ubisoft game, I have to say the support on this game is pretty good. New cars and content always added. The game is unfortunately Online Only based. It's heavily relied with Online services.TL;DR: Overall pretty decent Ubisoft title. Pure arcade, despite Forza being better in quality, this game can be fun in it's own ways especially with friends or just to vibe to with Spotify in the background.

Fallout 4 Nuka-WorldPretty decent expansion, probably better when on sale, there's definitely a lot of quirks. Game actually doesn't force you to be a raider. You can literally off the raiders at any point (would recommend towards the end of the DLC) and free the slaves. Baffles me what these reviews are talking about. Some are justified, most are just exaggerated.Even with a Minutemen playthrough, it was not conflicted when I chose to free the slaves. Yes, you can work with the raiders to free the park, however, as I already mentioned, you can off all of them at the end when they want to take over the commonwealth. Don't see the problem here. You're given a choice of what you want to do.I would mostly recommend this DLC for the exploration, weapons, and just a new location to explore just like Far Harbor. Don't expect much as of a good story.
Yes

Dying Light 2 Stay HumanI've been looking forward to the next chapter of the Dying Light Series. For the first two hours, I'm quite satisfied. Though, I do wish Dunovo was not included. Fortunately, I have not run into any problems yet. 1440p on High Settings with my 5700XT. The only change I made was disabling motion-blur.Things I liked:I do enjoy the location that was picked, especially from the start of the game. A nice introduction and references about previous events, backstories of how the infection happened. I'm not expecting much of a story, but so far I think it's been alright. Some of the character details are just amazing.Combat is a subjective topic. I'm pretty neutral with the combat. It certainly takes time to get used to. I think the Human x Human combat is much more engaging compared to the first Dying Light.The parkour aspect is also a subjective topic. Just as I mentioned about the combat, it does take time to get used to. It honestly was a bit frustrating at first in some segments. I'm pretty neutral about the change. This is subject to change in the future as I unlock more perks.Things I don't like:As for as I played, Night-time isn't as dark as the first Dying Light. Do note I'm on my first night, I'm not sure if it's just the reflection of the Moon itself, I was disappointed by how light it is when exploring at the night.Dunovo. Why did you add this?No weapon repair? At least what I'm aware of, there is no weapon repair system.UI I'm personally not a fan of. I enjoyed what Dying Light 1 had. I feel like if you kept the same formula, it would be perfectly fine.Why can't you sprint by default? Countless times you naturally want to press Shift (or whatever control input) to run faster. I'm not much of a fan of having yourself run by default.My Experience Overall:It's aight. I think it's not the greatest nor the worst game, it's decent. The first Dying Light was jank in it's own ways too. But some of the things were done better I admit. I have not run into anything bug-related, I'll be honest. But I know they're out there. Though I'm still early in the game, I'm sure I'll run into something at one point. Performance is apparently bad, guess I'm one of the lucky ones that didn't have the problem. It's a mixed bag, there are things I wish they kept from Dying Light 1 and moved over for the second game. Meanwhile, there are some changes I like. But recommending this at $60? I didn't have many expectations and enjoyed what I played so far. I cam agree to wait for a sale if you're patient enough.If you're expecting much of a Dying Light 1 feel and don't like change, you're going to be disappointed.

Train Sim World® 2It would be great if the tutorial actually served it's purpose. Y'know...teach you how to do things. This is one thing the game does not. The tutorial does not tell you everything. Done them multiple times, and nothing carries over what you have 'learned'.If I have to sit here and lurk Steam Discussions, Read PDF files and Watch YouTube videos to actually figure out how to play the game because your tutorials don't explain everything properly in the year 2022, you did something wrong. I get it's a simulator, but this could of been done way better.Gonna have to downvote this one chief.

В этой игре нет соло системы. То есть тебя кидает против дуо спокойно. А дуо тут очень сильное, поднять кента очень легко. Соло чел намного и намного слабее. Поэтому покупать СТРОГО с другом.

Der Ansatz war ziemlich gut.  2017 fing die Entwicklung an. Leider gibt es seit längerer Zeit keinen sichtbaren Fortschritt in der Entwicklung mehr. Das letzte "große" Update war Dez. 2021. Das nächste Update (fire ant) soll laut Support in den "nächsten" Monaten (Datum?) sein. Auch ein release Datum wird nicht angegeben. Im Grunde genommen kann das Spiel und dessen Entwicklung als tot angesehen werden. Spieleinhalt. Minikampagne mit 3 LevelnEinige kniffelige SzenarienFree Play Modus mit 4 festen Maps. Wird aber schnell langweilig.Die angesagten knapp 20€ muss jeder selbst entscheiden ob er sie dafür ausgeben möchte. Ich würde es nicht wieder machen.Anfagen der Community werden mit den gleichen steriotypen Antworten bedacht: Wir haben zu wenig Ressourcen, ein gutes Spiel braucht nun mal lange (5+ Jahre?), nach dem nächsten Update denken wir das an (Planung, Datum?), nach dem release (Datum?) werden wir darüber nachdenken. Ich empfehle: Finger weg denn für den Preis bekommt man sehr gute, fertige Spiele die man dauerhaft spielen kann.

не фанат серии постал,покупал чисто для коллекции.Но первая часть однозначно оправдала вложенные деньги!+1)ачивки - ну это просто мана небесная,таких крутых атчивок я ещё не видел.Тут  и разные шутки и пасхалки например на сериал декстер, ну просто 5+  2)не которые обьекты очень интересно нарисованы, в своём стиле  3)цена на скидке,дешевле стоимости доширака.- 1) просто лютое управление,хутшее из всех игр в которые я играл  2)дело было такое:купил я эту игру в 2:00 и запустил где-то в 2:05,в итоге я чуть  не обосрался от музыки,вообще музыка и озвучка так себе,но это простительно игре которая старше половины юзиров в инете. 7.5\10

ПЛЮСЫ-Отличный нуар,затягивает на часов 30 минимум,самое лучшие в игре это блястящий каст актёров + англ озвучки.Приятно видеть актёров которых уже замечал в разных сериалах и фильмах.90%-это актёры из сериала CSI ,но есть не которые из сверъестественного,мэд мэн и других.МИНУСЫ-однозначно финал,не хочу спойрелить, но концовка подвела, я видел концовки книг,сериалов,фильмов,игр и т.д,но для детективного,нео нуара -это слабо.Уже в последним отделе видел, как приблизительно закончиться.Думал я концовка будет как в макс пейн 1 или может как в мафии первой.Закончилось глупо и не завершено, но мне понравилось. Есть ещё минусы,прорисовка,физика,баги...Итог: 8.7 из 10 . Жду второй части, с новыми героями и новой историей,прямо как в настоящем детективе. И так  - 1 за концовку и - 0.3 за всё остальное.  Отднозначно шедевр.
